scc.action: Troubleshoot the GGSN. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the GGSN, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_202_FROM_GGSN_MANDATORY_IE_MISSING
scc.description: The GGSN responded with the "Mandatory IE missing" GTPv1 cause code (#202).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the GGSN. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the GGSN, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_203_FROM_GGSN_OPTIONAL_IE_INCORRECT
scc.description: The GGSN responded with the "Optional IE incorrect" GTPv1 cause code (#203).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the GGSN. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the GGSN, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: CAUSE_129_FROM_PGW_NEW_PDP_TYPE_DUE_TO_NETWORK_PREFERENCE
scc.description: The GGSN/PGW responded with the "New PDP type due to network preference" GTPv1 cause code (#129). This cause code indicates that the MS has requested the IPv4v6 PDP type and only IPv4 or IPv6 address is allowed for the PDN, based on the GGSN operator policy.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: CAUSE_130_FROM_PGW_NEW_PDP_TYPE_DUE_TO_SINGLE_ADDRESS_BEARER_ONLY
scc.description: The GGSN/PGW responded with the "New PDP type due to single address bearer only" GTPv1 cause code (#130). This cause code indicates that the MS has requested the IPv4v6 PDP type and both IPv4 and IPv6 addressing is possible in the PDN but the Dual Address Bearer Flag of the Common Flags IE is set to 0 or the Common Flags IE is absent, or only single IP version addressing is possible in the PDN.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: RAN_TIMEOUT
scc.description: No response was received from the RNC.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: MSISDN_NOT_ACCEPTED
scc.description: PDP context activation was rejected, since MSISDN is not valid according to the format requirement.
scc.action: Check the subscription data in HLR/HSS

scc.name: INCORRECT_CONFIGURATION
scc.description: The RA configuration is missing in the SGSN-MME for WCDMA.
scc.action: Create the missing RA configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: MOCN_ATTACH_REJECT
scc.description: Signaling procedure has been rejected to trigger CS and PS coordination by the RNC.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERNAL_REASON
scc.description: SGSN-MME internal failure.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: MS_LEAVING_NODE
scc.description: The MS is performing mobility procedure from the SGSN-MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: LOCATION_UPDATE_REJECT_FROM_MSC_OR_VLR
scc.description: The MSC/VLR rejected the Location Update.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: REJECT_INITIATED_FROM_CAMEL
scc.description: Reject initiated from CAMEL
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: RELEASE_INITIATED_FROM_CAMEL
scc.description: Release initiated from CAMEL
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SUBSCRIPTION_WITHDRAWN_FROM_HLR_OR_HSS
scc.description: The HLR/HSS sent the Cancel Location with MAP cause "subscription withdrawn".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SUBSCRIBER_DELETED_BY_CLI_COMMAND
scc.description: The subscriber was removed from the SGSN-MME by the delete_subscriber or action_ue_detach_start CLI command. The SGSN-MME sent Purge-MS to the HLR/HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_OF_INACTIVE_SUBSCRIBERS_INITIATED
scc.description: Detach of inactive subscriber has been triggered.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SGSN_INTERNAL
scc.description: In a Service Request Abort event, it means that paging timed out. In a Service Request Reject event, the SGSN did not receive SECURITY_MODE_COMPLETE, or received SECURITY_MODE_REJECT from the RNC.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MS and the RNC. Verify that there is no problem with the NRI to SGSN mapping configuration. Verify that the NRI table in the RNC is pointed to the correct node. Verify that the NRI length is same in both the SGSN and the RNC.

scc.name: PERIODIC_OR_INTRA_RAU_FOR_UNKNOWN_SUBSCRIBER
scc.description: Periodic or Intra RAU Request was received from unknown or detached subscriber.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The UE sent faulty RIL3/NAS message.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Iu-C or S1-MME traffic from the UE, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: ALERT_REQUEST_FROM_MSC_OR_VLR
scc.description: The MSC sent a BSSAP+ Alert Request, during Location Update.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: SUSPEND_RECEIVED
scc.description: The BSC sent BSSGP Suspend.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: BSSGP_STATUS_RECEIVED
scc.description: The BSC sent BSSGP Radio Status.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Gb traffic from the BSC, and check the cause code in the BSSGP Radio Status message.

scc.name: SM_STATUS_RECEIVED
scc.description: The UE sent SM Status. The PDP context was deactivated.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Gb or Iu-C traffic from the MS, and check the cause code in the SM Status message.

scc.name: CANCEL_LOCATION_RECEIVED
scc.description: HLR has sent Cancel Location.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERNAL_STATE_MISMATCH
scc.description: SGSN-MME internal failure.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: IDENTITY_CHECK_FAILED
scc.description: The MS sent a faulty Identity Response.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Gb or Iu-C traffic from the MS, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: MS_NOT_RESPONDING
scc.description: No response was received from the MS.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MS and the radio interface.

scc.name: GTP_U_SETUP_FAILED
scc.description: The SGSN-MME failed to setup the GTP-U tunnel internally.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: For MS initiated primary PDP context activation procedure: The Gateway Selection procedure in the S4-SGSN failed, and fallback from S4 to Gn is not allowed, or the MS has EPS subscription data, or the MS already has an active S4 PDN connection. For SRVCC Handover: The UE or the MME don't support the SRVCC procedure.
scc.action: For MS initiated primary PDP context activation procedure: Check the Gateway Selection procedure using the test_gw_selection command. For SRVCC Handover: Check the SRVCC configuration.

scc.name: APN_ACCESS_DENIED_NO_SUBSCRIPTION
scc.description: Possible causes are as follows: -The APN supplied by SCP is denied access. -The subscribed APN/PDP TYPE/PDP ADDRESS is inconsistent with the requested information.
scc.action: Check the SCP. Compare the APN/PDP TYPE/PDP ADDRESS in the subscription data of the HLR with the data sent from the MS.

scc.name: EIR_BLACKLISTED
scc.description: The IMEI is blacklisted in the EIR.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: COLLIDING_TEMPORARY_LOGICAL_LINK_IDENTITIES_TLLIS
scc.description: Another MS is already attached in the RA with the same TLLI.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: OLD_RA_UNKNOWN
scc.description: The old RA cannot be mapped to the old SGSN.
scc.action: Check the cooperating RA configuration. For GSM, the value on the parameter GbForceAttachAtUnknownRai can be changed to reject the procedure with CC#10.

scc.name: NATIONAL_ROAMING_RESTRICTION
scc.description: Signaling procedure was rejected due to National Roaming Restriction.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: LLC_RESET_FAILED
scc.description: No response was received from the MS, during LLC XID negotiation of Reset parameter.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the BSC. Use ITC to capture the Gb traffic toward the MS, and analyze the captured traffic. If this analysis gives no clear indication of the problem, try resetting the signaling BVC or toggling the Gb interface. Most likely, packets are lost in downlink direction on the Gb interface.

scc.name: NO_DEFAULT_BEARER_MATCHED_BETWEEN_TARGET_ENB_AND_MME
scc.description: The E-RAB list in the Path Switch Request received from the target eNodeB does not contain any default bearer matching the active default bearers for the UE in the MME.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the S1-MME traffic toward the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: MODIFY_BEARER_REQUEST_OR_CREATE_SESSION_REQUEST_TOWARDS_SGW_UNSUCCESSFUL
scc.description: The Modify Bearer or Create Session procedure toward the SGW failed.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_67_FROM_SGW_INVALID_LENGTH
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Invalid length" GTPv2 cause code (#67). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_68_FROM_SGW_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response or Modify Bearer Response with the "Service not supported" GTPv2 cause code (#68). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure, since the requested service or feature is not supported.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_69_FROM_SGW_MANDATORY_IE_INCORRECT
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response or Delete Session Response with the "Mandatory IE missing" GTPv2 cause code (#69). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_70_FROM_SGW_MANDATORY_IE_MISSING
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Mandatory IE missing" GTPv2 cause code (#70). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_72_FROM_SGW_SYSTEM_FAILURE
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "System failure" GTPv2 cause code (#72). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_73_FROM_SGW_NO_RESOURCES_AVAILABLE
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "No resources available" GTPv2 cause code (#73). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_78_FROM_SGW_MISSING_OR_UNKNOWN_APN
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Missing or unknown APN" GTPv2 cause code (#78). The PGW rejected the procedure, since the requested APN is not configured.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_82_FROM_SGW_DENIED_IN_RAT
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Denied in RAT" GTPv2 cause code (#82). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure, since the requested service is not accepted in the RAT.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_83_FROM_SGW_PREFERRED_PDN_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Preferred PDN type not supported" GTPv2 cause code (#83). This cause code is used by the PGW to indicate that the PDN type received in the Create Session Request message is not supported by the PGW for the PDN corresponding to the received Access Point Name (APN).
scc.action: Check the configuration in the PGW. Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_84_FROM_SGW_ALL_DYNAMIC_ADDRESSES_ARE_OCCUPIED
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "All dynamic addresses are occupied" GTPv2 cause code (#84). The PGW rejected the procedure, since all dynamic IP addresses are occupied.
scc.action: Check the IP address pool in the PGW or the RADIUS server.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_86_FROM_SGW_PROTOCOL_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Protocol type not supported" GTPv2 cause code (#86). The SGW rejected the procedure, since the requested S5/S8 protocol is not supported.
scc.action: Revise the network configuration.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_91_FROM_SGW_NO_MEMORY_AVAILABLE
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "No memory available" GTPv2 cause code (#91). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure, since it had no memory to allocate.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_92_FROM_SGW_USER_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "User authentication failed" GTPv2 cause code (#92). The PGW rejected the procedure, since the RADIUS server failed to authenticate the user.
scc.action: Verify the username and password configured in the UE. Check that the user is provisioned correctly in the RADIUS server. Check the communication between the PGW and the RADIUS server.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_93_FROM_SGW_APN_ACCESS_DENIED_NO_SUBSCRIPTION
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "APN access denied - no subscription" GTPv2 cause code (#93). This cause code is used to indicate that the PGW has denied the user access to an APN because a subscription is required, but the subscriber does not have the necessary subscription. For example because the Selection Mode IE sent by the MME/S4-SGSN indicates 'MS provided APN, subscription not verified' or 'Network provided APN, subscription not verified'.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_100_FROM_SGW_REMOTE_PEER_NOT_RESPONDING
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Remote peer not responding" GTPv2 cause code (#100). This cause code is sent in a response message from the SGW to the MME/S4-SGSN when the SGW does not receive a response from the PGW.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responded with an unknown GTPv2 cause code.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and check the GTPv2 cause code.

scc.name: REJECT_WHEN_TAKING_THE_UE_TO_ECM_CONNECTED_STATE
scc.description: Paging of the UE failed.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_65_FROM_SGW_INVALID_MESSAGE_FORMAT
scc.description: The SGW responded with Delete Session Response or Create Session Response with the "Invalid message format" GTPv2 cause code (#65). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: DUPLICATE_E_RAB_ID_RECEIVED_FROM_ENB
scc.description: The MME received a list of E-RABs from the eNodeB, containing duplicate E-RAB IDs.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the S1AP traffic toward the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: SGW_ADDRESS_COULD_NOT_BE_DERIVED
scc.description: When trying to determine if an SGW change is needed, the SGSN-MME failed to map the new Tracking Area to an SGW address. The DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the RAI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-sgw:x-Interface-Protocol' service failed. Interface = s5|s8, Protocol = gtp|pmip.
scc.action: Check the communication with the DNS server(s). Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: FEATURE_DEDICATED_BEARER_IS_DISABLED
scc.description: The Dedicated bearers feature is disabled.
scc.action: Revise the Dedicated bearers feature configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: UE_BLOCKED_DUE_TO_IMEI_CHECK
scc.description: The UE was blocked due to IMEI Check.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_18_FROM_SGW_NEW_PDN_TYPE_DUE_TO_NETWORK_PREFERENCE
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "New PDN type due to network preference" GTPv2 cause code (#18). This cause code indicates that the UE has requested the IPv4v6 PDN type and only IPv4 or IPv6 addressing is allowed for the PDN, based on the PGW operator policy.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_19_FROM_SGW_NEW_PDN_TYPE_DUE_TO_SINGLE_ADDRESS_BEARER_ONLY
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "New PDN type due to single address bearer only" GTPv2 cause code (#19). This cause code indicates that the UE was rejected when requesting the IPv4v6 PDN type for a PDN where both IPv4 and IPv6 addressing is possible. This indicates that either the Dual Address Bearer Flag of the Indication IE is set to 0, that the Indication IE is absent, or that only single IP version addressing is possible in the PDN.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_66_FROM_SGW_VERSION_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_NEXT_PEER
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Version not supported by next peer" GTPv2 cause code (#66). This cause code is sent from the SGW to the MME/S4-SGSN to indicate that the PGW does not support the GTP version.
scc.action: Check that the node that received the Create Session Request from the SGW is actually a PGW node and not a GGSN without PGW functionality.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_94_FROM_SGW_REQUEST_REJECTED
scc.description: The SGW responded with the "Request rejected" GTPv2 cause code (#94). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure, due to unspecified reasons.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_103_FROM_SGW_CONDITIONAL_IE_MISSING
scc.description: The SGW responded with Delete Session Response or Create Session Response with the "Conditional IE missing" GTPv2 cause code (#103). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_104_FROM_SGW_APN_RESTRICTION_TYPE_INCOMPATIBILITY_WITH_CURRENTLY_ACTIVE_PDN_CONNECTION
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "APN Restriction type incompatibility with currently active PDN connection" GTPv2 cause code (#104). This cause code indicates that the PGW has denied the user access to an APN because of the APN Restriction feature. The newly requested APN has an APN Restriction value that is not compatible with the APN Restriction value(s) of the currently active PDN connection(s).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: OTHER_REJECT_CAUSE_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responded with an unknown GTPv2 cause code.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and check the GTPv2 cause code.

scc.name: SGSN_NOT_SUPPORT_S4_MODE_ACTIVATION
scc.description: The S3/S4 Architecture Support feature is turned off in the SGSN-MME.
scc.action: Check the S3/S4 Architecture Support feature configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: GTPV2_CREATE_SESSION_RESPONSE_NOT_RECEIVED
scc.description: No GTPv2 Create Session Response was received from the SGW.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the SGW, and between the SGW and the PGW (if not co-located). Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: S4_FALLBACK_TO_GN_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The Gateway Selection procedure in the S4-SGSN failed.
scc.action: Check the Gateway Selection procedure using the test_gw_selection command.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_17_FROM_SGW_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_PARTIALLY
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Request accepted partially" (#17). One or several (but not all) bearers in the message have failed.
scc.action: Check the BEARER_CAUSE parameter in the EBM event.

scc.name: GTPV2_MODIFY_BEARER_RESPONSE_NOT_RECEIVED
scc.description: No GTPv2 Modify Bearer Response was received from the SGW.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the SGW. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: IE_MISSING_OR_INCORRECT_IN_MODIFY_BEARER_RESPONSE
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received a Modify Bearer Response message from the SGW with a missing or incorrect Information Element (IE).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_64_FROM_SGW_CONTEXT_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The SGW responded with Delete Session Response, Modify Bearer Response or Create Session Response with the "Context not found" GTPv2 cause code (#64). Either the SGW or the PGW rejected the procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_109_FROM_SGW_INVALID_PEER
scc.description: The SGW responded with Delete Session Response with the "Invalid peer" GTPv2 cause code (#109). This cause code is sent by the SGW to indicate that currently the UE is being managed by a different MME/S4-SGSN node than the node which has sent the Delete Session Request message. For example, it could happen in an Inter-SGSN/MME or IRAT handover failure scenario if the source/target SGSN/MME mistakenly initiates the implicit detach procedure while the UE is managed by the other SGSN/MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IE_MISSING_OR_INCORRECT_IN_CREATE_SESSION_RESPONSE
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received a Create Session Response from the SGW with missing or incorrect IE.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the GTP-C messages between the SGSN-MME and the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: DELETE_BEARERS_ON_SOURCE_SGSN_DURING_IRAT_HANDOVER
scc.description: The source S4-SGSN deleted bearers during the IRAT PS handover procedure from WCDMA to LTE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DELETE_UNSET_UP_BEARERS_ON_SOURCE_SGSN_DURING_IRAT_HANDOVER
scc.description: The source S4-SGSN deleted bearers that failed to be set-up on the target SGSN-MME during the IRAT PS handover procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the target SGSN-MME.

scc.name: CLR_WITH_INITIAL_ATTACH_RECEIVED
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received Cancel Location Request with Cancellation-type "Initial attach".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UE_HIGHER_BITRATES_THAN_16_MBPS_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The QoS was rejected by the UE, probably because the UE does not support bitrates higher than 16 Mbps.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_17
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Network Failure" RIL3 cause code (#17).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: PSM_UE_EXIT_POWER_SAVING_MODE
scc.description: The UE has exited power saving mode. Information about the duration added to the event.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_ATTACH_THROTTLING
scc.description: The Attach Request was rejected due to Attach Throttling. When Attach Throttling is enabled, the MME only allows a certain number of Attach Request messages per second.
scc.action: Check the value of the parameter MMEAttachThrottlingAttachRateLimit in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: REJECTED_DUE_TO_ADMISSION_CONTROL
scc.description: The maximum number of attached subscribers or bearers allowed by the capacity license has been reached, or the CPU has been overloaded.
scc.action: Check the capacity license. Check the number of SAU.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_116_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "Network Optimisation" RANAP cause code (#116).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_257_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "IP Multicast Address And APN Not Valid" RANAP cause code (#257).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_258_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "MBMS De-Registration Rejected Due To Implicit Registration" RANAP cause code (#258).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_259_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "MBMS - Request Superseded" RANAP cause code (#259).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_260_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "MBMS De-Registration During Session Not Allowed" RANAP cause code (#260).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_261_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "MBMS - No Data Bearer Necessary" RANAP cause code (#261).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_262_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "Periodic Location Information not Available" RANAP cause code (#262).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_263_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "GTP Resources Unavailable" RANAP cause code (#263).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_264_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "TMGI in Use and Overlapping MBMS Service Area" RANAP cause code (#264).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the RANAP traffic toward the RNC, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the RNC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_265_FROM_RNC
scc.description: The RNC responded with the "MBMS - No cell in MBMS Service Area" RANAP cause code (#265).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_107_FROM_SGW_INVALID_REPLY_FROM_REMOTE_PEER
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with the "Invalid reply from remote peer" GTPv2 cause code (#107). The SGW considered the reply from the the PGW invalid.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the PGW. Capture the control plane traffic between the SGW and the PGW and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_GN_FALLBACK_DUE_TO_EXISTING_S4
scc.description: The Gateway Selection procedure in the S4-SGSN failed, and fallback from S4 to Gn is not allowed because the MS has EPS subscription data, or the MS already has an active S4 PDN connection.
scc.action: Check the Gateway Selection procedure using the test_gw_selection command.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_AUTHENTICATION_INFO
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Authentication Information Answer with the unsuccessful DIAMETER cause from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_UPDATE_LOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Update Location Answer with the unsuccessful DIAMETER cause from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_AIA_WITH_DIAGNOSTIC_ODB_APN
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Authentication Information Answer with the Experimental-Result-Code AVP of DIAMETER_ERROR_ROAMING_NOT_ALLOWED and the Error-Diagnostic AVP of ODB_HPLMN_APN or ODB_VPLMN_APN from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_ULA_WITH_DIAGNOSTIC_ODB_APN
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Update Location Answer with the Experimental-Result-Code AVP of DIAMETER_ERROR_ROAMING_NOT_ALLOWED and the Error-Diagnostic AVP of ODB_HPLMN_APN or ODB_VPLMN_APN from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_AIA_WITH_DIAGNOSTIC_ODB_ALL_APN
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Authentication Information Answer with the Experimental-Result-Code AVP of DIAMETER_ERROR_ROAMING_NOT_ALLOWED and the Error-Diagnostic AVP of ODB_ALL_APN from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_ULA_WITH_DIAGNOSTIC_ODB_ALL_APN
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received an Update Location Answer with the Experimental-Result-Code AVP of DIAMETER_ERROR_ROAMING_NOT_ALLOWED and the Error-Diagnostic AVP of ODB_ALL_APN from the HSS. The cause is supplied in the event field as the Original Cause Code.
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: SUBSCRIPTION_WITHDRAWN_FROM_HSS
scc.description: The HSS sent Cancel Location Request with Cancellation-Type SUBSCRIPTION_WITHDRAWAL (#2).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_TRIGGERED_BY_PGW_TO_DEACTIVATE_LAST_PDN_CONNECTION
scc.description: The PGW sent a Delete Bearer Request message for the last PDN connection with GTPv2 cause code #8 "reactivation requested" or GTPv2 cause code #9 "PDN reconnection to this APN disallowed", or the SGW/PGW has restarted and the SGSN-MME is cleaning out all PDN connections.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PGW_INITIATED_PDN_DISCONNECTION_GTPV2_CAUSE_PDN_RECONNECTION_TO_THIS_APN_DISALLOWED
scc.description: The PGW sent Delete Bearer Request (not for the last PDN connection) with the "PDN reconnection to this APN disallowed" GTPv2 cause code (#9).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PGW_INITIATED_DELETE_BEARER_REQUEST_GTPV2_CAUSE_REACTIVATION_REQUESTED
scc.description: The MME receives a Delete Bearer Request message with the "Reactivation requested" cause in the PGW-initiated PDN Disconnection procedure (not the last PDN connection). In this case, the MME sends a Deactivate EPS Bearer Context Request message to the UE with a "Reactivation requested" cause code.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: CHANGE_OF_SUBSCRIPTION_DATA_IN_HSS
scc.description: Subscription data has been changed in the HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: QOS_PROFILE_INVALID
scc.description: The QoS profile received from the SGW is invalid.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the GTP-C messages between the SGSN-MME and the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_WHEN_TAKING_THE_UE_TO_PMM_CONNECTED_STATE
scc.description: Paging of the UE failed.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: FEATURE_NRSPCA_IS_DISABLED
scc.description: The feature 'Network-Requested Secondary PDP Context' is off.
scc.action: Revise the 'Network-Requested Secondary PDP Context' feature configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: IMS_EMERGENCY_SUPPORT_CONFIGURATION_IN_PLMN_DOES_NOT_MATCH
scc.description: The UE requested an IMS Emergency call, but the configuration for the PLMN does not allow it.
scc.action: Check the IMS Emergency support configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: IMS_EMERGENCY_NOT_SUPPORTED_IN_GERAN_OR_UMTS
scc.description: IRAT Handover of an IMS Emergency call to GERAN/UTRAN (GSM/WCDMA) is not allowed according to the configuration in the MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_NO_RESPONSE_FROM_MSC
scc.description: No response was received from the MSC.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the MSC over the SGs interface. Troubleshoot the MSC.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_2
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "IMSI Unknown in HLR/HSS" RIL3 cause code (#2).
scc.action: Check the subscription data in the HLR/HSS.

scc.name: TA_LA_MISCONFIGURATION_IN_MME
scc.description: The Tracking Area could not be mapped to a Location Area and MSC, due to missing/incomplete TA-LA mapping configuration in the SGSN-MME.
scc.action: Check the TA-LA mapping configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: REJECT_GN_DUE_TO_EXISTING_S4
scc.description: The MS requested to activate a PDP context for Gn mode but there is S4 bearer(s) activated already. According to specification, Gn mode an S4 mode bearers cannot co-exist.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MS.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_3
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Illegal UE" RIL3 cause code (#3).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: BEARER_DELETED_DUE_TO_SRVCC
scc.description: The voice bearer was deleted in the MME due to SRVCC handover. This is the normal procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HSS_UNREACHABLE_FOR_AUTHENTICATION_INFO
scc.description: No response was received from the HSS during the Send Authentication Info procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the HSS. Troubleshoot the S6a interface according to instructions in the Troubleshooting document.

scc.name: HSS_UNREACHABLE_FOR_UPDATE_LOCATION
scc.description: No response was received from the HSS during the Update Location procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the HSS. Troubleshoot the S6a interface according to instructions in the Troubleshooting document.

scc.name: GTPV2_TIME_OUT
scc.description: No GTPv2 response message was received.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the peer node.

scc.name: NO_VECTORS_RECEIVED
scc.description: The HSS sent an Authentication Information Answer containing no authentication vectors.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the HSS.

scc.name: AUTH_FAILED_T3460_TIMEOUT
scc.description: No response was received from the UE, during the Authentication procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: AUTH_FAILED_NON_EPS_AUTHENTICATION_UNACCEPTABLE
scc.description: The UE responded with Authentication Failure with the "Non-EPS authentication unacceptable" EMM cause code (#26). This EMM cause code is sent to the network if the "separation bit" in the AMF field of AUTN is set to 0 in the Authentication Request message (see 3GPP TS 33.401).
scc.action: Check the configuration of the HSS/AUC.

scc.name: AUTH_FAILED_AUTS_MISSING
scc.description: The UE responded with Authentication Failure. The AUTS is missing in the message.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the S1-MME traffic toward the UE, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: AUTH_FAILED_XRES_NEQ_RES
scc.description: The RES received from the UE in the Authentication Response does not match the XRES received from the HSS/HLR/AUC. This can happen when the authentication parameters K, OP/OPc or authentication algorithm in the HSS/HLR/AUC and the USIM don't match.
scc.action: Check the authentication parameters provisioning in the HSS/HLR/AUC and the SIM/USIM.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_6
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Illegal ME" RIL3 cause code (#6).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_11
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "PLMN not Allowed" RIL3 cause code (#11).
scc.action: Check that the correct Location Area is configured in the TA-LA mapping configuration in the MME.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_12
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Location Area not Allowed" RIL3 cause code (#12).
scc.action: Check that the correct Location Area is configured in the TA-LA mapping configuration in the MME.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_13
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Roaming Not Allowed in this Location Area" RIL3 cause code (#13).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_15
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "No Suitable Cells in Location Area" RIL3 cause code (#15).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: MSC_SUPERVISION_REJECT_CAUSE_22
scc.description: The MSC responded with the "Congestion" RIL3 cause code (#22).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC/VLR.

scc.name: NO_RESPONSE_FROM_SGW
scc.description: No response was received from the SGW.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the SGW. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: IPV6_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_VISITORS
scc.description: The UE is a visitor and requested PDN/PDP type IPv6, but IPv6 is not allowed for visitors according to the SGSN-MME configuration.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_BEARERS_PER_USER
scc.description: The dedicated bearer activation request was rejected because the max allowed number of bearers for the UE would be exceeded.
scc.action: Revise the dedicated bearer activation logic in the PCRF or IMS system.

scc.name: NOT_CURRENT_SGW
scc.description: The request was rejected because it came from an SGW that the MME does not regard as the current SGW.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PROCEDURE_INTERRUPTED_BY_OTHER_PROCEDURE
scc.description: The signaling procedure could not be handled because a higher priority procedure is executed, for example detach.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: FAILURE_IN_UE_OR_ENODEB
scc.description: The MME received a reject from the UE or the eNodeB, or timed out when waiting for a response from the UE or the eNodeB.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE trace to capture the S1-MME traffic toward the UE and the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: NON_EXISTING_BEARER
scc.description: The Linked Bearer ID received from the SGW is not an existing active bearer.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW. If a timeout toward the eNodeB occurs, troubleshoot the eNodeB as well. Check for the L_Detach with the SCC 288 (TIMEOUT_INITIAL_CONTEXT_SETUP_RESPONSE) for the UE around the time when the SCC 656 is generated.

scc.name: NOT_A_DEFAULT_BEARER
scc.description: The Linked Bearer ID received from the SGW indicates a dedicated bearer, not a default bearer.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: IMS_EMERGENCY_NOT_SUPPORTED_IN_CURRENT_TAI_FOR_IMSI_SERIES
scc.description: IMS emergency call is not supported in the current TAI for the IMSI series of this subscriber, according to SGSN-MME configuration.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UNEXPECTED_LINKED_BEARER_ID
scc.description: The dedicated bearer activation in combination with default bearer activation is rejected because the received Linked Bearer ID does not indicate the default bearer being created.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the PGW.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_QOSPOLICY
scc.description: The SGSN-MME received a QoS which is higher than what is allowed by the QoS Policy Map configured in the SGSN-MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SERVICE_REQUEST_FAILURE_DUE_TO_HANDOVER_INTERFERENCE
scc.description: Service Request is rejected due to handover interference.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_IPV4_ADDRESS_IN_GGSN_OR_PGW_CONTROL_PLANE_OR_USER_PLANE
scc.description: There is no IPv4 address in control plane or user plane for one of the PDN connections in the SGSN Context Response or Context Response message.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the old SGSN/MME, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: NOT_EMM_REGISTERED
scc.description: The UE sent signaling message in EMM Deregistered state (the UE is detached in the MME). Service Request is rejected with CC#9 if the UE is unknown in the MME and S-TMSI is missing.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_COMMON_DEFAULT_BEARERS
scc.description: During the TAU procedure, there are PDN connections or PDP contexts which can be mapped to PDN connections from the source node, but all default bearers are indicated as inactive from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INITIAL_CONTEXT_SETUP_FAILURE
scc.description: The MME received an Initial Context Setup Failure message while waiting for the Initial Context Setup Response from the eNodeB.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: ABORT_DUE_TO_ATTACH_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was aborted due to interfering Attach Request from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ABORT_DUE_TO_TAU_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was aborted due to interfering TAU Request from UE or SGSN Context Request from new MME .
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ABORT_DUE_TO_EXTENDED_SERVICE_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was aborted due to interfering Extended Service Request from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERFERING_S1_RESET
scc.description: The signaling procedure was aborted due to interfering S1 Reset from the eNodeB.
scc.action: Identify the failing signaling sequence based on the eNodeB UE S1AP ID (ENB_UE_S1AP_ID) using ITC trace and the EBM data. Troubleshoot the signaling sequence and determine if the problem is caused by the MME, the eNodeB, or the UE. Use the EBM data to determine if the problem is specific for a type or brand of UE. Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: SESSION_INTERFERENCE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected because the MME was busy handling another procedure with higher priority.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTEGRITY_FAIL
scc.description: The message received from the UE failed the NAS integrity check.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the S1-MME traffic toward the UE, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: TA_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_TARGET_ENODEB
scc.description: In a Handover event, this means that the selected TAI provided by the source eNodeB is not supported by the target eNodeB. In a Service Request event, this means that the received TAI is not part of the UE TAI list.
scc.action: Check the configuration (neighbor cells) in the eNodeB.

scc.name: INITIAL_CONTEXT_SETUP_RESPONSE_NO_BEARERS
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with Initial Context Setup Response that did not contain any successful bearer.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: UE_MOVED_TO_NON_3GPP
scc.description: Signaling procedure was aborted or rejected, since the UE moved to non-3GPP access.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERFERING_PATH_SWITCH_REQUEST
scc.description: Signaling procedure was interfered by Path Switch Request.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HANDOVER_CANCELLED_RECEIVED
scc.description: The eNodeB sent Handover Cancel.
scc.action: Collect the EBM, ITC or UE trace data. Troubleshoot the eNodeB. If the eNodeB cancels the handover due to a timeout, check other nodes which are not responding, for example, MSC. If the Forward Relocation Request size is more than 1500 bytes, also perform the following: Check the connectivity of S10 interface by using the action_icmp_ping and action_icmp_traceroute commands with corresponding and smaller packet sizes of the Forward Relocation Request. Check the MTU configuration of S10 interface on target MME.

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with Handover Failure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: TARGET_ENODEB_ID_INVALID
scc.description: Signaling procedure was rejected due to invalid target eNodeB id.
scc.action:
If the MME is the target node of an inter-MME S1-Based Handover, troubleshoot the source MME and the source eNodeB. Check that the target eNodeB ID is known in the target MME pool area with the show_mme_global_enodeb CLI command.
If the MME is the source node of inter-MME S1-Based Handover, troubleshoot the source MME and the source eNodeB. Check that the target TAI is not defined in more than one MME pool using the show_mme_tracking_area and show_tracking_area_supporting_global_enodeb CLI commands. In the DNS, check that the target TAI points to an MME which serves the target eNodeB. Make sure that each TAI is only registered to one MME pool.
If an incorrectly configured eNodeB is removed from the MME pool when troubleshooting the MME, delete it using the action_mme_delete_global_enodeb CLI command.
Then, troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: MME_UNABLE_TO_ALLOCATE_S1AP_ID
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected because MME failed to allocate an S1AP ID.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: LOCATION_CANCELED
scc.description: S1-Based Handover was rejected due to failure in all Modify Bearer Response from the SGW.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the SGW. Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: ACCESS_RESTRICTED
scc.description: S1-Based Handover was rejected due to access restriction in EUTRAN during Handover preparation in local MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IMSINS_ACCESS_RESTRICTED
scc.description: Signaling procedure was rejected by the MME due to local access restriction configuration.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ATTEMPT_BY_SGW_TO_UPDATE_BEARERS_IN_DIFFERENT_PDN_CONNECTIONS
scc.description: The Update Bearer Request received from the SGW contained bearers belonging to different PDN connections. This is not allowed.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: ATTEMPT_BY_SGW_TO_CHANGE_BEARER_TYPE
scc.description: The Update Bearer Request received from the SGW changed the QCI from non-GBR to GBR or vice versa. This is not allowed.
scc.action: Check the QoS configuration in the PGW or the PCRF.

scc.name: SCTP_DEVICE_FAILURE
scc.description: The Path Switch Request message is ignored because the SCTP device status is not ready.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ALL_PACKET_ORIENTED_SERVICES_BARRED
scc.description: The subscription data from HLR/HSS indicates "All Packet Oriented Services Barred" (in the ODB information).
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ABORTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_DUE_TO_SECTOR_ID_NOT_CONFIGURED_IN_MME
scc.description: CDMA2000 uplink A21 messages are aborted, since a sector ID is not configured in the MME.
scc.action: Check the sector ID configuration in the MME. Check sector ID configuration in the eNodeB.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_IWS_SINCE_IWS_HAS_ENCOUNTERED_AN_INTERNAL_ERROR
scc.description: CDMA2000 uplink A21 messages are rejected, since the IWS has encountered a 1x system internal error.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the IWS. Check the IWS configuration in the MME.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_IWS_DUE_TO_PROTOCOL_ERROR_IN_UPLINK_MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 uplink A21 messages are rejected, due to protocol error in uplink messages.
scc.action: Capture the S102 traffic between the MME and the IWS with a protocol analyzer and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_IWS_DUE_TO_ERRONEOUS_UPLINK__MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 uplink A21 messages are rejected, due to erroneous uplink messages.
scc.action: Capture the S102 traffic between the MME and the IWS with a protocol analyzer and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: ABORTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_DUE_TO_NO_ACK_MESSAGE_RECEIVED_FROM_IWS
scc.description: CDMA2000 uplink A21 messages are aborted, since no acknowledge messages are received from the IWS. No more send attempts will be made to this IWS.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the IWS. Check the communication with the IWS.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_SINCE_UE_NOT_REACHABLE_FROM_MME_FOR_DOWNLINK_MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 downlink A21 messages from the IWS are rejected by the MME, since the UE is not reachable from the MME for downlink messages.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_DUE_TO_PROTOCOL_ERROR_IN_DOWNLINK_MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 downlink A21 messages from the IWS are rejected by the MME, due to protocol errors in downlink messages.
scc.action: Capture the S102 traffic between the MME and the IWS with a protocol analyzer and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: REJECTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_DUE_TO_ERRONEOUS_DOWNLINK_MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 downlink A21 messages from the IWS are rejected by the MME due to erroneous downlink messages.
scc.action: Capture the S102 traffic between the MME and the IWS with a protocol analyzer and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: ABORTED_BY_LOCAL_MME_SINCE_UE_NOT_REACHABLE_FROM_MME_FOR_DOWNLINK_MESSAGE
scc.description: CDMA2000 downlink A21 messages from the IWS are aborted by the MME, since the UE is not reachable from the MME for downlink messages.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NAS_NON_DELIVERY_INDICATION_RECEIVED_DURING_SECURITY_MODE_CONTROL_PROCEDURE
scc.description: Signaling procedure aborted due to that the eNodeB sends NAS Non Delivery Indication to the MME when the MME performs the Security Mode Control procedure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: STATIC_MME_OR_SGSN_NOT_FOUND_IN_TABLE
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target MME/SGSN failed, because of missing entry in the static MME/SGSN selection table.
scc.action: Check the static MME/SGSN selection table configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: NO_ACTIVE_DEFAULT_BEARER_FROM_SOURCE_NODE
scc.description: During the ISC-TAU procedure, there are no PDN connections or PDP contexts which can be mapped to PDN connections from the source node.
scc.action: Perform UE tracing or ITC tracing, or both, for a selected subscriber on both the target and the source node. Check the process of the PDP context handling in 2G or 3G after any CSFB-like scenarios. Check the QoS settings in the source node for GSM and WCDMA that cause deactivations of PDP context due to lower QoS than LTE, when the UE moved to the source system. Enable the gn_qos_downgrade_allowed_g and gn_qos_downgrade_allowed_w functions to allow downgrade of QoS. Enable the deactivate_pdp_after_rau function in the GSM or WCDMA source node.

scc.name: SECURITY_MODE_REJECT_FROM_UE
scc.description: The UE responded with Security Mode Reject.
scc.action: Check the NAS cause code received from the UE (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: NO_IDENTIFICATION_RESPONSE_FROM_UE
scc.description: No Identification Response was received from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: NO_ESM_INFORMATION_RESPONSE_FROM_UE
scc.description: No ESM Information Response was received from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: BOTH_SRVCC_AND_PS_HANDOVER_FEATURES_IN_STATE_OFF
scc.description: Both features SRVCC and PS Handover were in state off when SRVCC with PS Handover was initiated by the eNodeB.
scc.action: Check the configurations of the srvcc and ps_ho feature parameters. Consider license agreement if necessary.

scc.name: SRVCC_FEATURE_IN_STATE_OFF
scc.description: The feature SRVCC was in state off when SRVCC Handover was initiated by the eNodeB.
scc.action: Check the configuration of the srvcc feature parameter. Consider license agreement if necessary.

scc.name: PS_HANDOVER_FEATURE_IN_STATE_OFF
scc.description: The feature PS Handover was in state off when Handover was initiated by the eNodeB.
scc.action: Check the configuration of the ps_ho feature parameter. Consider license agreement if necessary.

scc.name: NO_VOICE_BEARER_IN_CONTEXT_SRVCC_NOT_POSSIBLE
scc.description: The UE had no voice bearer during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: SRVCC_NOT_POSSIBLE_TO_IDENTIFY_MSC
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Check the MSC configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_OK_PS_FAILED_DUE_TO_FAILURE_TO_IDENTIFY_TARGET_SGSN
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the target SGSN during SRVCC with PS Handover. CS part was successful, but PS part failed.
scc.action: Check the DNS configuration or the static SGSN configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: SRVCC_PROTOCOL_ERROR_IN_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_FROM_MSC
scc.description: The MSC responded with an incorrect SRVCC PS to CS Response during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the MSC, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_OK_PS_FAILED_DUE_TO_PROTOCOL_ERROR_IN_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_FROM_SGSN
scc.description: The target SGSN responded with an incorrect Forward Relocation Response during SRVCC with PS Handover. CS part was successful, but the PS part failed.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the target SGSN. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGSN, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_OK_PS_REJECTED_BY_SGSN
scc.description: The target SGSN responded with Forward Relocation Response with cause code indicating failure during SRVCC with PS Handover. CS part was successful, but PS part failed.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the target SGSN. Use ITC to capture the GTP-C traffic toward the SGSN, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: SRVCC_NO_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_RECEIVED_FROM_MSC
scc.description: No SRVCC PS to CS Response was received from the MSC during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the MSC. Troubleshoot the MSC.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_OK_PS_FAILED_DUE_TO_NO_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_FROM_SGSN
scc.description: No Forward Relocation Response was received from the target SGSN during SRVCC with PS Handover. CS part was successful, but PS part failed.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the target SGSN. Troubleshoot the target SGSN.

scc.name: SRVCC_NO_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_RECEIVED_FROM_NEITHER_MSC_NOR_SGSN
scc.description: No SRVCC PS to CS Complete Notification from the MSC or Forward Relocation Compete from the target SGSN was received during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the MSC. Troubleshoot the MSC. Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the target SGSN. Troubleshoot the target SGSN.

scc.name: SRVCC_NO_COMPLETE_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE_FROM_MSC
scc.description: No SRVCC PS to CS Complete Notification was received from the MSC during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the MSC. Troubleshoot the MSC.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_OK_PS_FAILED_DUE_TO_NO_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_FROM_SGSN
scc.description: No Forward Relocation Complete was received from the target SGSN during SRVCC with PS Handover. CS part was successful, but PS part failed.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the target SGSN. Troubleshoot the target SGSN.

scc.name: SRVCC_HANDOVER_CANCEL_ARRIVED_AND_IGNORED_AFTER_PREPARATION_PHASE
scc.description: During SRVCC Handover, the eNodeB responded with Handover Cancel after a complete message from either the SGSN or the MSC was received. Handover Cancel was ignored by the MME.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: SRVCC_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_UE
scc.description: The SRVCC service is not supported by UE (The MS capability received from UE didn't include support for the SRVCC service).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: SRVCC_CS_AND_PS_LTE_TO_GERAN_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The eNodeB used Handover Type=LTEtoGERAN during SRVCC with PS Handover. The MME does not support SRVCC with PS Handover from LTE to GERAN.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the eNodeB.

scc.name: SRVCC_SERVICE_NOT_SUBSCRIBED_BY_THIS_UE
scc.description: The SRVCC service is not subscribed by the UE (The UE subscription received from the HSS did not include STN-SR information).
scc.action: Check the subscription in the HSS.

scc.name: SRVCC_FAILURE_FROM_MSC_IN_EXECUTION_PHASE
scc.description: The MSC responded with PS to CS Complete Notification with cause indicating failure during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC.

scc.name: SRVCC_FAILURE_FROM_MSC_IN_PREPARATION_PHASE
scc.description: The MSC responded with PS to CS Response with cause indicating failure during SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the MSC.

scc.name: NO_E_RAB_MODIFY_RESPONSE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: No E-RAB Modify Response was received from the eNodeB.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: NO_MODIFY_EPS_BEARER_CONTEXT_RESPONSE_FOR_DEFAULT_BEARER_FROM_UE
scc.description: No Modify EPS Bearer Context Response was received from the UE, for the default bearer.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: NO_E_RAB_SETUP_RESPONSE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: No E-RAB Setup Response was received from the eNodeB.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: NO_ACTIVATE_DEDICATED_EPS_BEARER_CONTEXT_RESPONSE_FROM_UE
scc.description: No Activate Dedicated EPS Bearer Context Response was received from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: TA_FROM_ENODEB_NOT_IN_TAI_LIST
scc.description: The MME received a Service Request where the TAI from the eNodeB (on S1AP level) does not match the UE TAI list in the MME.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the eNodeB.

scc.name: ACTIVATE_DEDICATED_EPS_BEARER_CONTEXT_REJECT_FROM_UE
scc.description: The UE responded with Activate Dedicated EPS Bearer Context Reject.
scc.action: Check the NAS cause code received from the UE (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: E_RAB_SETUP_RESPONSE_FAILURE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with E-RAB Setup Response indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the S1AP cause code received from the eNodeB (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: MODIFY_EPS_BEARER_CONTEXT_REJECT_FROM_UE
scc.description: The UE responded with Modify EPS Bearer Context Reject.
scc.action: Check the NAS cause code received from the UE (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: UE_CONTEXT_MODIFICATION_RESPONSE_FAILURE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with UE Context Modification Response indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the S1AP cause code received from the eNodeB (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: E_RAB_MODIFY_RESPONSE_FAILURE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with E-RAB Modify Response indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the S1AP cause code received from the eNodeB (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: E_RAB_MODIFY_RESPONSE_NO_BEARERS_MODIFIED_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with E-RAB Modify Response indicating that no bearers were modified.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__FORMERR
scc.description: The external DNS server, or the caching resolver in the SGSN-MME, returned error code 1 (Format Error).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the DNS traffic between the SGSN-MME and the DNS server. Check the format of the query sent by the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__SERVFAIL
scc.description: The external DNS server, or the caching resolver in the SGSN-MME, returned error code 2 (Server Failure).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the DNS server.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__NXDOMAIN
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 3 (Non-Existent Domain). This means that the FQDN that the SGSN-MME tried to lookup is not provisioned in the DNS server.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s).

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__NOTIMP
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 4 (Not Implemented).
scc.action: Check if the DNS server is compliant.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__REFUSED
scc.description: The external DNS server, or the caching resolver in the SGSN-MME, returned error code 5 (Query Refused).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the DNS server.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__BADVERS
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 16 (Bad OPT Version).
scc.action: Check if the DNS server is compliant.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__INVALID_ARGS
scc.description: The external DNS server, or the caching resolver in the SGSN-MME, returned error code 1 (Format Error).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the DNS traffic between the SGSN-MME and the DNS server. Check the format of the query sent by the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__FORMAT_ERROR
scc.description: The DNS client in SGSN-MME rejected the format of the DNS query.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is high frequency of this Sub Cause Code.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_FAILURE_OF_MODIFY_BEARER_REQUEST_IN_ATTACH_PROCEDURE
scc.description: Detach UE due to timeout or failure of modify bearer request in attach procedure. The failure of modify bearer procedure is included in a L_DETACH event since L_ATTACH event is considered successful when attach complete is received in MME.(Thus, modify bearer procedure is not covered in L_ATTACH event).
scc.action: No action to be taken.

scc.name: DNS_TIMEOUT
scc.description: The DNS query timed out.
scc.action: Check the communication towards the DNS server(s). Use the CLI commands action_icmp_ping, action_icmp_trace_route or the troubleshooting commands test_gw_selection, test_dns_resolve, and dig.

scc.name: GGSN_SELECTION_FAILED__APN_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The GGSN selection procedure failed, because the DNS A (IPv4) lookup using APN FQDN failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities. Check the GGSN configuration for IMSI-Based Gateway Selection. Make sure the PgwIpv6Address parameter is not configured for the GGSN.

scc.name: SUBSCRIPTION_DATA_NOT_VALID
scc.description: The subscription data in the SGSN-MME is not valid or not confirmed by HLR/HSS. This is a temporary fault probably caused by an HLR/HSS restart which makes the SGSN-MME mark the subscription data as not confirmed by the HLR/HSS.
scc.action: Check the HLR/HSS for recent restarts and monitor succeeding events to verify that the sub cause code does not continue to occur in events.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__NO_MATCH
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the APN / PDN type / PDP type requested by the UE is not allowed by subscription. This normally happens because of wrong APN configured in the UE. Another possible reason is that the HLR/HSS updates the subscription data and the new subscribed APN, PDP type, and so on do not support existing PDP contexts. If APN conversion is enabled and conversion is performed, it is the converted APN that is not allowed by subscription.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check APN conversion configuration. Consider using the APN Redirect feature.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__AMBIGUOUS
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because more than one APN profile in the subscription match the request from the UE. If APN conversion is enabled and conversion is performed, it is the converted APN that match more than one APN profile in the subscription.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check APN conversion configuration. Consider using the APN Redirect feature.

scc.name: EBS_SCC_STORE_DEVICE_CONTEXT_ERROR_RECEIVED
scc.description: This SCC indicates that during the PDP context activation procedure or RAB re-establishment procedure, the same user plane FEID and IP address assigned by the GGSN or RNC are already used by another PDP context.
scc.action: SGSN initialized deactivation to indicate store device context error in DP

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the UE provided an illegal parameter combination (APN / PDN type / PDP type / PDP address), for example the UE provided APN but no PDP type.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Consider using the APN Redirect feature.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__PGW_ID_WRONG_FORMAT
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the PGW ID in the subscription data is missing or has wrong format.
scc.action: Check the subscription data in the HSS.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__APN_OI_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the APN-OI requested by the UE is not allowed. Either the APN-OI does not match the HPLMN configured in the SGSN-MME, or the APN-OI from a visitor matches VPLMN but "VPLMN Address Allowed" is false in the subscription data.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Consider using the APN Redirect feature.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__VPLMN_OI_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the PLMN ID of the RAI/TAI does not belong to this SGSN-MME.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__SGSN_DEFAULT_APN_UNKNOWN
scc.description: APN resolving failed, because the SGSN default APN is not configured. SGSN default APN is needed when the subscription data only has wildcard APN and no APN is requested by the UE.
scc.action: Check the SGSN default APN configuration.

scc.name: IPV4_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type IPv4, but this is not allowed by subscription. If APN conversion is enabled and conversion is performed, it is the subscription that match the converted APN that is used.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check APN conversion configuration.

scc.name: IPV6_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type IPv6, but this is not allowed by subscription. If APN conversion is enabled and conversion is performed, it is the subscription that match the converted APN that is used.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check APN conversion configuration.

scc.name: EMERGENCY_APN_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The emergency APN was not found in the SGSN-MME configuration.
scc.action: Check the emergency profile configuration.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__APN_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the APN FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-pgw:x-Interface-Protocol' service failed. Interface = s5|s8, Protocol = gtp|pmip. If Static Gateway Selection is enabled, this also means that no PGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration for the particular APN.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME, if applicable. Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__RAI_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the RAI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-sgw:x-Interface-Protocol' service failed. Interface = s5|s8, Protocol = gtp|pmip. If Static Gateway Selection is enabled, this also means that no SGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration for the particular RAI.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME, if applicable. Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__TAI_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the TAI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-sgw:x-Interface-Protocol' service failed. Interface = s5|s8, Protocol = gtp|pmip. If SGW Selection Based on IMSI Number Series and Geographical Area (GA) is enabled, this means that no SGW was found in the SGW Selection Based on IMSI Number Series and GA configuration for the particular IMSI number series in the specific GA. If Static Gateway Selection is enabled, this also means that no SGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration for the particular TAI.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Check the SGW Selection Based on IMSI Number Series and GA configuration in SGSN-MME, if applicable. Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME, if applicable. Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__SGW_S4_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the SGW canonical nodename FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-sgw:x-s4' service failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__SGW_S11_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the SGW canonical nodename FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-sgw:x-s11' service failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__IP_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS A/AAAA (IPv4/IPv6) lookup using the SGW S11 or the PGW S5/S8 hostname failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__PGW_ID_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the PGW canonical nodename FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-pgw:x-Interface-Protocol' service failed. Interface = s5|s8, Protocol = gtp|pmip.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__OLD_SGW_UNAVAILABLE
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because the current SGW is marked as unreachable and there is no other SGW candidate to select.
scc.action: Check the IP connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the SGW. Troubleshoot the SGW. Revise the DNS provisioning, and the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME if applicable, to achieve redundancy.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__NO_MORE_SGW_CANDIDATES
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because the current SGW cannot be used and there is no other SGW candidate to select. The current SGW cannot be used because of IP version mismatch with the current SGSN-MME (this can happen at Inter-SGSN/MME mobility or IRAT).
scc.action: Revise the DNS provisioning, and the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME if applicable, to achieve redundancy.

scc.name: SGSN_OR_MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__UNSPECIFIED_ERROR
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target SGSN/MME failed, due to unspecified reasons.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__TAI_NOT_FOUND_IN_DNS
scc.description: The lookup of the target MME failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure or Type A/AAAA query using the TAI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-mme:x-Interface' service failed. Interface = s3|s10|gn.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__GUMMEI_NOT_FOUND_IN_DNS
scc.description: The lookup of the old MME failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure or Type A/AAAA query using the GUMMEI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-mme:x-Interface' service failed. Interface = s3|s10|gn.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: SGSN_OR_MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__POOL_NRI_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target SGSN/MME failed, because the Pool NRI configuration is missing or the routing area configuration is incorrect.
scc.action: Check the Pool NRI configuration in the SGSN-MME. Check that the local routing area configuration does not overlap with the routing area configurations in other SGSN-MME pool nodes.

scc.name: SGSN_OR_MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__MOCN_NRI_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target SGSN/MME failed, because the MOCN NRI configuration is missing.
scc.action: Check the MOCN NRI configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: SGSN_OR_MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__COOP_RA_CONFIG_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target SGSN/MME failed, because the co-operating RA configuration is missing.
scc.action: Check the co-operating RA configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: CREATE_SESSION_RESPONSE_WITH_CC_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responded with Create Session Response with a cause code indicating failure, including SGW can't find the PGW for a specific PDN.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 cause code code received from the SGW (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the SGW and the PGW.

scc.name: CREATE_SESSION_RESPONSE_BEARER_MISSING_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The Create Session Response received from the SGW did not include the expected bearer.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the GTP-C messages between the SGSN-MME and the SGW, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: MODIFY_BEARER_RESPONSE_WITH_BEARER_CAUSE_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responded with Modify Bearer Response or Modify Access Bearers Response with a Bearer Cause indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 Cause received from the SGW if recorded, in the ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event. Check the Bearer Causes if recorded in the EBM event. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: MODIFY_BEARER_RESPONSE_WITH_CC_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responded with Modify Bearer Response or Modify Access Bearers Response with a GTPv2 Cause indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 Cause received from the SGW (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE_FROM_ENODEB
scc.description: The eNodeB responded with Handover Failure.
scc.action: Check the S1AP cause code received from the eNodeB (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: S_NAPTR_PROCEDURE_FAILED__SERVICES_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The DNS S-NAPTR procedure failed, because none of the records returned by the DNS server matched the requested services (for example 'x-3gpp-pgw:x-s5-gtp').
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: SGSN_OR_MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__RAI_NOT_FOUND_IN_DNS
scc.description: The lookup of the old or target SGSN/MME failed, either because the type A (IPv4) DNS lookup using the NRI-RAI/RAI FQDN failed, or because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure using the NRI-RAI/RAI FQDN and the 'x-3gpp-Node:x-Interface' service failed. Node = sgsn|mme, Interface = s3|s16|gn|gp.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: RETRIEVAL_FAILURE
scc.description: There was an attempt to retrieve a UE geo-replica, but no Retrieval Response was received.
scc.action: Check the status of the remote MME. Also check the status of the S10 Interface.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__STATIC_PGW_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because no PGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration for the particular APN.
scc.action: Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__STATIC_SGW_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because no SGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration for the particular TAI or RAI.
scc.action: Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__NO_VALID_STATIC_PGW
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because no valid PGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration. None of the PGW candidates is configured with Capacity above 0 and correct Protocol Type.
scc.action: Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__NO_VALID_STATIC_SGW
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because no valid SGW was found in the Static Gateway Selection configuration. None of the SGW candidates is configured with Capacity above 0.
scc.action: Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: GTPC_INTERFACE_NOT_CONFIGURED
scc.description: The old or target SGSN/MME could not be contacted, because the local Gn/S3/S10 GTP-C IP address is not configured in SGSN-MME, or is configured with an IP-version that doesn't match the peer SGSN/MME node.
scc.action: Check the Gn/S3/S10 GTP-C IP service configuration in SGSN-MME.

scc.name: MAP_GGSN_TO_PGW_FAILED
scc.description: SGSN-MME could not find a co-located GGSN/PGW matching the GGSN currently in use. The APN was successfully mapped to a list of co-located GGSN/PGWs (by DNS lookup or local configuration). However, no co-located GGSN/PGW IP address matches the GGSN IP address in use.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Check the Static Gateway Selection configuration in SGSN-MME, if applicable. Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__INVALID_HOSTNAMES
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because the hostname(s) returned from the DNS S-NAPTR procedure have an invalid format.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_gw_selection command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: PDP_DEACTIVATION_NO_GPRS_SUBSCRIPTION_DATA
scc.description: The SGSN initiates a PDP deactivation to the UE with the cause "re-activation required" due to the lack of GPRS subscription data available for this subscriber in Gn mode.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__UNKNOWN_ERROR
scc.description: The external DNS server, or the caching resolver in the SGSN-MME, or the DNS client in the SGSN-MME, returned an unknown error code.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the DNS traffic between the SGSN-MME and the DNS server. Check if the DNS server returns error codes.

scc.name: APN_RESOLVING_FAILED__PGW_ID_NOT_FOUND_FROM_HSS
scc.description: There is no PGW information from the HSS.
scc.action: Check the emergency info for emergency PGW or check subscription data for normal PGW from HSS.

scc.name: HANDOVER_EMC_SWITCH_TO_EMC
scc.description: For the handover of emergency bearer services, the hi flag in Create Session Request was modified from handover to initial request due to the HandoverIndicationOverride (hio) is set to true by the CLI modify_ue_remedy.
scc.action: Check the related CPI for the CLI modify_ue_remedy.

scc.name: RETRIEVAL_RESPONSE_WITH_OLD_GUTI
scc.description: A UE geo-replica was retrieved, but GUTI of the replica is different from the one indicated by the UE. This means that the UE geo-replica is no longer valid.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDP_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_GW_RESTARTED
scc.description: The S4-SGSN detects the SGW or PGW has restarted, then the S4-SGSN initiates the related PDP context deactivation procedure or deletes the PDP contexts without notifying the RNC and MSs.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REGIONAL_SUBSCRIPTION_RESTRICTION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to a regional subscription restriction.
scc.action: No action is required if the subscriber is restricted intentionally. Otherwise, update the regional subscription configuration in the MME and in the HSS.

scc.name: MISUSE_OF_RRC_ESTABLISHMENT_CAUSE_HIGHPRIORITYACCESS
scc.description: The UE used RRC Establishment Cause=highPriorityAccess although subscription data in the HSS did not contain information validating the UE to be an MPS subscriber.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UE_SIGNALING_CONTROL_OF_SGSN_OR_MME_TRIGGERING
scc.description: UE Signaling Control triggers this event because such kind of request message from the UE is controlled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: WRONG_IDENTITY_IN_IDENTITY_RESPONSE_FROM_UE
scc.description: UE sends wrong type of Identity or no Identity in Identity Response.
