scc.action: Use ITC to capture traffic toward the UE, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: NAS_NON_DELIVERY_INDICATION_RECEIVED_DURING_AUTHENTICATION_PROCEDURE
scc.description: Signaling procedure is aborted because the eNodeB sends an NAS Non Delivery Indication to the MME when the MME performs the Authentication procedure towards the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: NO_SECURITY_MODE_COMPLETE_FROM_UE
scc.description: No Security Mode Complete message was received from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: AUTH_FAILED_DATA_MISSING
scc.description: The HLR responded with the "Send Authentication Info" MAP message containing the "data missing" MAP cause.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Gr traffic toward the HLR, and analyze the captured traffic.Troubleshoot the HLR.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_SGW_FTEID_FOR_CONTROL_PLANE_MISSING
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the SGW F-TEID for control plane IE is missing.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN for non-recovery procedure or troubleshoot the backup MME for recovery procedure.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_SGW_NODE_NAME_INCORRECT
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the SGW Node Name IE is incorrect.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN for non-recovery procedure or troubleshoot the backup MME for recovery procedure.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_SENDER_FTEID_FOR_CONTROL_PLANE_MISSING
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the Sender F-TEID for Control Plane IE is missing.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN for non-recovery procedure or troubleshoot the backup MME for recovery procedure.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_UE_MM_CONTEXT_MISSING
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the MME/SGSN UE MM Context IE is missing.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN for non-recovery procedure or troubleshoot the backup MME for recovery procedure.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_UE_MM_CONTEXT_SECURITY_PARAMETERS_TYPE_MISMATCH
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the security parameters within the UE MM context are not correct.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN.

scc.name: GTPV2_PROTOCOL_ERROR_UE_MM_CONTEXT_UE_NETWORK_CAPABILITY_MISSING
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected due to the GTPv2 protocol error: the UE Network Capability parameter is missing.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the old MME or S4-SGSN for non-recovery procedure or troubleshoot the backup MME for recovery procedure.

scc.name: MAPPED_LA_RESTRICTED_BY_SUBSCRIPTION
scc.description: No mapped LA can be used because each mapped LA is restricted by subscription.
scc.action: Check the configuration.

scc.name: MAPPED_LA_UNUSABLE
scc.description: No mapped LA can be used because each LA allowed by subscription does not match LA selection profile.
scc.action: Check the configuration.

scc.name: ABORT_DUE_TO_INITIAL_UE_MESSAGE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was aborted due to interfering S1AP Initial UE Message from eNB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IGNORED_DUE_TO_X2_HANDOVER
scc.description: The signaling procedure was ignored due to ongoing X2 Handover Procedure having higher priority.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERFERING_UE_CONTEXT_RELEASE_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered by a UE Context Release Request from the eNodeB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_ACTIVE_DEFAULT_BEARER_FROM_UE
scc.description: EPS bearer context status in TAU Request indicate no active bearer.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: CSG_ID_NOT_ALLOWED_ACCORDING_TO_SUBSCRIPTION_DATA
scc.description: The UE is not allowed in the current CSG cell according to CSG subscription data received from the HSS.
scc.action: Allowed CSG IDs are configured as part of CSG subscription data for the UE in the HSS. The UE also maintains a list of allowed CSG IDs. Check that these are synchronized.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_THROTTLING_FOR_AUTHENTICATION_INFO
scc.description: The service is rejected due to S6a throttling during the Authentication Info procedure. When this throttling is enabled, the SGSN-MME only allows a limited number of outgoing Diameter request messages per second.
scc.action: Check the value of the S6aRequestAllowRate parameter. Or use ITC to capture and analyze the Diameter traffic over the S6a or S6d interface.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_THROTTLING_FOR_UPDATE_LOCATION
scc.description: The service is rejected due to S6a throttling during the Update Location procedure. When this throttling is enabled, the SGSN-MME only allows a limited number of outgoing Diameter request messages per second.
scc.action: Check the value of the S6aRequestAllowRate parameter. Or use ITC to capture and analyze the Diameter traffic over the S6a or S6d interface.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_DECODING_FAIL_FOR_AUTHENTICATION_INFO
scc.description: The Authentication procedure was rejected due to decoding failure or missing mandatory AVPs in the Authentication Information Answer (AIA) message.
scc.action: Check the authentication information(Vectors) in the HSS and check the mandatory AVPs in the AIA message.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_DECODING_FAIL_FOR_UPDATE_LOCATION
scc.description: The Location Update procedure was rejected due to decoding failure.
scc.action: Check the IMSI APN QCI subscription in the HSS. Value should be QCI 5 or higher for a default bearer.

scc.name: CSFB_FAILURE_DUE_TO_ENODEB
scc.description: The MME received a cause code in the UE Context Release Request message indicating that CSFB did not succeed.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: TIMEOUT_UE_CONTEXT_RELEASE_REQUEST
scc.description: No UE Context Release Request was received from the eNodeB.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the S1AP traffic toward the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: APN_REDIRECTION_REJECTED_BY_IMEI_TAC
scc.description: The APN Redirection was rejected, since the device type of the MS or UE is configured in the APN Redirection criteria.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: SX_FAILURE
scc.description: The PDN connection is not established or is disconnected due to Sx/Smp session establishment failure.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the Sx/Smp interface according to instructions in the Troubleshooting document, for example, using ITC log to trace Sx establishment.

scc.name: NO_EXPECTED_TAU_REQUEST_AFTER_HO
scc.description: No expected TAU Request was received from the UE after handover.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ROAMING_RESTRICTION_BASED_ON_IMEI_TAC
scc.description: Signaling procedure was rejected due to Roaming Restriction based on IMEI-TAC or TAC-SV.
scc.action: Check the IMEI-TAC/TAC-SV blacklist or whitelist in MME.

scc.name: PGW_INITIATED_DELETE_BEARER_REQUEST_GTPV2_CAUSE_RAT_CHANGED_FROM_3GPP_TO_NON_3GPP
scc.description: The S4-SGSN receives the Delete Bearer Request message with the "RAT changed from 3GPP to non-3GPP" cause in the PGW-initiated PDN Disconnection procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HANDOVER_SWITCH_TO_INITIAL_ACTIVATION_INVALID_PGW
scc.description: The handover procedure from non-3GPP switches to the initial activation procedure, and the PDN connection is created. This behavior happens because the PGW identity of the APN is missing or invalid.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Diameter traffic toward the HSS, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: HANDOVER_SWITCH_TO_INITIAL_ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The handover procedure from non-3GPP switches to the initial activation procedure, and the PDN connection is created. This behavior happens because the S4-SGSN receives the Create Session Response message with the "Context not found" cause.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HANDOVER_SWITCH_TO_INITIAL_ACTIVATION_GN_MODE
scc.description: The handover procedure from non-3GPP switches to the initial activation procedure, and the PDN connection is created. This behavior happens because the Gn mode is in use.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: COLLISION_NSAPI
scc.description: The NSAPI requested by the MS in the PDP context activation request is already used by another active PDP context of this MS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IRR_BY_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME prevented the UE from using PS service because of international roaming restriction, a configurable function of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NRR_BY_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME prevented the UE from using PS service because of national roaming restriction, a configurable function of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IP_ADDRESS_RESET_BY_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The UE, which had registered before the configuration change, was allocated or deprived of a dedicated IP address because of IP address reset, a configurable function of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DEACTIVATED_BY_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME initiated a deactivation procedure because of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature when the UE moved out of a location-based IP address allocation area or into a new location-based IP address allocation area.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MOBILITY_REJECTED_BY_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME rejected the UE mobility request because of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature when the UE moved out of a location-based IP address allocation area or into a new location-based IP address allocation area.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SGSN_DUAL_ADDRESS_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The event is triggered due to DualAddressBearerFlag parameter is set to off but the PDP context is using PDP type IPv4v6. Possible events include PDP deactivation during mobility procedure.
scc.action: Check the DualAddressBearerFlag parameter settings in the neighboring SGSN-MMEs. The DualAddressBearerFlag parameter value in the source SGSN-MME may be inconsistent with that in the target SGSN-MME.

scc.name: SRVCC_ABORTED_DUE_TO_VOICE_BEARER_DELETED_BY_GW
scc.description: The SGSN-MME aborts the SRVCC procedure due to gateway deleting the voice bearer. For instance, this behavior happens if during an ongoing SRVCC procedure, the other party terminates the call.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_PGW_RESELECTION
scc.description: The PDN was deactivated when the UE roamed crossing regions within one PLMN and the node function pgw_reselection is enabled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HSS_BASED_PCSCF_RESTORATION_BASIC_MECHANISM
scc.description: The MME deletes the IMS PDN with the cause "reactivation requested" when the MME receives IDR from the HSS indicating P-CSCF Restoration Request. If the IMS PDN is the last PDN of the UE, the MME detaches the UE with detach type "re-attach required".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_NO_DEFAULT
scc.description: The PDN is deactivated when the default bearer is deactivated.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_PGW_RESELECTION
scc.description: The UE was detached when it roamed crossing regions within one PLMN and the node function pgw_reselection is enabled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SRVCC_ABORTED_DUE_TO_HSS_BASED_PCSCF_RESTORATION
scc.description: The sub-cause code is filled in the L_HANDOVER event if the MME aborts the SRVCC procedure because receiving the Insert Subscriber Data Request message with the P-CSCF restoration indication.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_DEFAULT_BEARERS_ACCEPTED_BY_ENODEB
scc.description: None of the default bearers was accepted by the target eNodeB.
scc.action: Check radio resources in the eNodeB.

scc.name: NO_MEMBERSHIP_INDICATED_WHEN_TARGET_CSG_ID_DIFFERENT_FROM_SOURCE_IN_X2HO_TO_HYBRID_CELL
scc.description: The MME receives a Path Switch Request message without the CSG Membership Status IE when the UE is accessing a hybrid cell through the X2 handover procedure, and the target cell has a different CSG ID from the source cell or the source cell does not have a CSG ID.
scc.action: Upgrade the eNodeB/HeNB Gateway to Release 11 to support this message.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_113_FROM_SGW_APN_CONGESTION
scc.description: The PGW rejects the procedure because of APN-based congestion, and responds with a Create Session Response message containing the APN_CONGESTION GTPv2 cause code (#113). This can happen during an Attach or a standalone PDN Connectivity procedures.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the PGW

scc.name: DEACTIVATION_DUE_TO_QOS_CHANGE_WITH_NO_QOS_NEG_FLAG
scc.description: The SGSN deactivated the PDP context, because the Update PDP Context Response message received from the GGSN included the changed QoS value while the "No Qos Negotiation" flag in the Update PDP Context Request message was set.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: RETRIEVAL_FAILURE_INCOMPATIBLE_DATA
scc.description: A UE geo-replica was retrieved, but it was not compatible with the current software version and feature level.
scc.action: Contact Ericsson Support if there is a high frequency of this sub cause code.

scc.name: IMS_EMERGENCY_SUPPORT_CONFIGURATION_IN_IMSINS_DOES_NOT_MATCH
scc.description: The UE requested an IMS Emergency call, but the configuration for the IMSI Number Series did not allow it.
scc.action: Check the IMS Emergency support configuration in the SGSN-MME. Note that this code might indicate the wanted behaviour, that is blocking some subscribers from IMS Emergency Service in the PS domain.

scc.name: PDN_CONNECTIVITY_REJECT_BY_MME_DUE_TO_ALL_PGW_APN_CONGESTED
scc.description: The MME rejected the Attach or PDN Connectivity procedure without sending Create Session Request message, because all applicable PGWs previously indicated congestion for the APN.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the PGW.

scc.name: APN_AMBR_ERROR
scc.description: PDP is deactivated by the SGSN, because APN AMBER is undefined or APN AMBR UL or DL is 0.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Iu-C/Gb traffic from the UE and the GTP-C traffic toward the GGSN/SGW. Check if the QoS is correct.

scc.name: DEDICATED_BEARER_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The SGSN deactivated the PDP context,because the SGSN does not support dedicated bearer for GSM.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IGNORED_DUE_TO_PDP_BEING_ACTIVATED_OR_DEACTIVATED
scc.description: A new S4 primary PDP context activation request is ignored when the first primary PDP context is being activated or being deactivated.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: GGSN_RESPONDED_WITH_REJECT_CAUSE_CONTEXT_NON_EXISTENT
scc.description: The SGSN deactivated the PDP context or activation PDP procedure is failed, because the Update PDP Context Response or Delete Pdp Context Response received from the GGSN including the cause Context Non Existent.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IMSINS_COMBINED_REGISTRATION_RESTRICTED
scc.description: The UE is not allowed to connect to the CS domain through the SGs interface in the combined attach procedure or combined TAU procedure, because the PreventCombinedRegistration parameter is set to true for the IMSI number series to which the UE belongs. The list_imsins CLI command can be used to check the PreventCombinedRegistration configuration for the IMSI number series.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IGNORED_S4_MODE_MS_INIT_SECONDARY_PDP_CONTEXT_ACTIVATION
scc.description: The MS-initiated secondary PDP context activation procedure is ignored because it is not supported in S4 mode.
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: HSS_BASED_PCSCF_RESTORATION_BASIC_MECHANISM_UE_BECOME_REACHABLE
scc.description: When the MME performs basic mechanism of HSS-Based P-CSCF Restoration and the UE is in the ECM_IDLE state, the IMS PDN is kept instead of being deleted once the MME fails to notify the UE of the IMS PDN deactivation request with "reactivation requested". The kept IMS PDN will be deactivated with reactivation requested when the UE is reachable at the next UE activity, or at next P-CSCF Restoration with successful paging. The sub cause code is reported in the L_PDN_DISCONNECT and L_DETACH events, indicating the PDN disconnection or detach is initiated for this case.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: FEATURE_SMS_OVER_SGS_IS_DISABLED
scc.description: The UE is not allowed to connect to the CS domain through the SGs interface in the combined attach procedure or combined TAU procedure, because the SMS over SGs feature is deactivated. The list_feature_state CLI command can be used to check the configuration for the SMS over SGs feature.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SRVCC_NOT_SUPPORTED_IN_LOCAL_CONFIGURATION
scc.description: The UE is not allowed to do SRVCC Handover to CS due to configuration on IMSI number series.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MPS_PAGING_ABORTED_DUE_TO_HIGHER_PRIORITY_SIGNALING_RECEIVED
scc.description: The ongoing Paging procedure was aborted by the MME because the received signaling message has a higher priority compared with the previously received message. This happened when MPS-classified ARP level is configured.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NON_MPS_PAGING_ABORTED_DUE_TO_DDN_WITH_HIGHER_PRIORITY_ARP_RECEIVED
scc.description: The ongoing Paging procedure was aborted by the MME because the received DDN message has a higher ARP priority than that of the previously received message. This happened when MPS-classified ARP level is not configured.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MODIFY_BEARER_REQUEST_FAILURE_OR_TIMEOUT_IN_TAU_PROCEDURE
scc.description: No Modify Bearer Response was received from the SGW or the Modify Bearer Request message was rejected by the SGW in TAU procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MODIFY_BEARER_REQUEST_FAILURE_OR_TIMEOUT_IN_SERVICE_REQUEST_PROCEDURE
scc.description: No Modify Bearer Response was received from the SGW or the Modify Bearer Request message was rejected by the SGW in Service Request procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UE_DETACHED_DUE_TO_NO_MODIFY_BEARER_RESPONSE_FROM_SGW_IN_SERVICE_REQUEST_PROCEDURE
scc.description: The UE was detached by the MME because no Modify Bearer Response was received from the SGW in the Service Request procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UE_DETACHED_DUE_TO_MODIFY_BEARER_PROCEDURE_FAILURE_IN_ATTACH_PROCEDURE
scc.description: The UE was detached by the MME because a Modify Bearer Request was rejected by the SGW in the Attach procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SDS_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The MME sent a request to an SDS GW and received a response with a cause related to a protocol error from the SDS GW.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SDS_UNSUPPORTED_ERROR
scc.description: The MME sent a request to an SDS GW and received a response with an unknown or unsupported cause from the SDS GW.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_MSISDN_LESS_UNSUPPORTED
scc.description: The request was rejected because MSISDN-less subscribers were not supported by the SGSN.
scc.action: Check the setting for the msisdn_less_support parameter at the SGSN.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_MUTUAL_EXCLUSION_OF_CAMEL_AND_MSISDN_LESS
scc.description: The request was rejected because a UE with CAMEL subscription but no MSISDN is not supported.
scc.action: Check the subscription data in the HLR.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_MSISDN_LESS_UNSUPPORTED
scc.description: The UE was detached because MSISDN-less subscribers were not supported by the SGSN.
scc.action: Check the setting for the msisdn_less_support parameter at the SGSN.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_MUTUAL_EXCLUSION_OF_CAMEL_AND_MSISDN_LESS
scc.description: The UE was detached because a UE with CAMEL subscription but no MSISDN is not supported.
scc.action: Check the subscription data in the HLR.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_NAS_MOBILITY_CONGESTION
scc.description: A NAS Request was rejected since MME is in congestion. The MME responded the UE with the "Congestion" EMM cause code (#22) and back-off timer T3346.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HANDOVER_SWITCH_TO_INITIAL
scc.description: The hi flag in Create Session Request modified from handover to initial request due to CLI ue_remedy has set handoverIndicationOverride (hio) to true.
scc.action: Check CPI for CLI ue_remedy.

scc.name: DELETE_BEARER_REQUEST_WITH_CC_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW has sent a Delete Bearer Request initiating the procedure.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 cause code code received from the SGW (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event).

scc.name: GBR_BEARER_DELETION_DUE_TO_UE_RELEASE
scc.description: The GBR Bearer was deleted by the MME because UE Release Request indicating UE not reachable was received.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: GBR_BEARER_DELETION_DUE_TO_PAGING_TIMEOUT_IN_S1_CONNECTION_SETUP
scc.description: The GBR Bearer was deleted by the MME because no paging response was received during S1 connection setup.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_INTER_PLMN_MOBILITY_RESTRICTION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected because of Inter-PLMN Mobility Restriction.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MSC_SELECTION_FAILED__HOSTNAME_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover because the DNS query failed to retrieve the MSC hostname.
scc.action: Check the DNS configuration.

scc.name: MSC_SELECTION_FAILED__IP_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover because the DNS query failed to retrieve the MSC IP address.
scc.action: Check the DNS configuration.

scc.name: MSC_SELECTION_FAILED__SV_INTERFACE_NOT_CONFIGURED
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover because the Sv interface had not been configured.
scc.action: Check the MME configuration.

scc.name: MSC_SELECTION_FAILED__INVALID_TARGET_ID
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover due to the invalid target ID.
scc.action: Check the target ID format in the Handover Required message.

scc.name: MSC_SELECTION_FAILED__STATIC_MSC_NOT_FOUND_IN_TABLE
scc.description: The MME failed to identify the relevant MSC during SRVCC Handover because the MSC had not been configured on the MME or the IP version configured for the Sv interface on the MME did not match the MSC capable of SRVCC Handover.
scc.action: Check the MME configuration.

scc.name: SDS_LOCATION_UPDATE_FAILED_CONGESTION
scc.description: The MME sent an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-REQUEST message to an SDS GW and received an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-ACK message with cause "congestion" from the SDS GW.
scc.action: Check peer SDS GW.

scc.name: SDS_LOCATION_UPDATE_FAILED_NETWORK_FAILURE
scc.description: The MME sent an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-REQUEST message to an SDS GW and received an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-ACK message with cause "network failure" from the SDS GW.
scc.action: Check peer SDS GW.

scc.name: SDS_LOCATION_UPDATE_FAILED_IMSI_UNKNOWN
scc.description: The MME sent an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-REQUEST message to an SDS GW and received an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-ACK message with cause "imsi unknown" from the SDS GW.
scc.action: Check peer SDS GW.

scc.name: SDS_LOCATION_UPDATE_FAILED_OTHER_REASON
scc.description: The MME sent an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-REQUEST message to an SDS GW and received an SGSLite-LOCATION-UPDATE-ACK message with cause "other reason" from the SDS GW.
scc.action: Check peer SDS GW.

scc.name: SDS_FEATURE_OFF
scc.description: The procedure failed for an SDS UE because the M2M/IoT: Direct Short Data Service feature was turned off.
scc.action: Check the feature configuration.

scc.name: SDS_INVALID_NAS_REQUEST
scc.description: The procedure failed for an SDS UE because the MME received an invalid NAS message (for example, non-combined Attach) from the SDS UE.
scc.action: Check the SDS UE.

scc.name: SDS_GW_COMMUNICATION_FAILED_TIMEOUT
scc.description: The MME failed to send an SGs-Lite message to an SDS GW or the MME did not receive a response from an SDS GW before timeout.
scc.action: Check peer SDS GW and the corresponding TCP connection.

scc.name: GTPV2_MODIFY_ACCESS_BEARERS_RESPONSE_NOT_RECEIVED
scc.description: No GTPv2 Modify Access Bearers Response was received from the SGW.
scc.action: Check the connectivity between the SGSN-MME and the SGW. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: EPS_BEARER_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_PTT_NOT_TRANSFERRED_DURING_IRAT
scc.description: The MME deactivated the dedicated EPS bearer during IRAT mobility from the MME to the Gn-SGSN because the dedicated EPS bearer had QCI 65, 66, 69 or 70 and the allow_ptt_bearer_transfer_during_irat parameter was set to off.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_PTT_NOT_TRANSFERRED_DURING_IRAT
scc.description: The MME deactivated the PDN connection during IRAT mobility from the MME to the Gn-SGSN because the default EPS bearer had QCI 69 or 70 and the allow_ptt_bearer_transfer_during_irat parameter was set to off.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_TRIGGERED_PDN_DISCONNECTION
scc.description: The PDN connections were disconnected because the UE was detached, or TAU failed.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_NO_NATIVE_SECURITY_CONTEXT_AVAILABLE_AFTER_TAU
scc.description: The UE was detached because the SGSN-MME did not successfully establish security context for the UE after TAU. For example, in the IRAT handover scenario, SGSN-MME fails to re-establish security context for the UE after TAU or when the SGSN-MME is waiting for the TAU Complete message or performing the security procedure after TAU, the SGSN-MME receives an interference S1 intra-MME handover message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: MOBILITY_REJECTED_BY_PTT_NOT_TRANSFERRED_DURING_IRAT
scc.description: The SGSN-MME rejected the UE mobility request when there was no PDN connection available to transfer during IRAT mobility from the MME to the Gn-SGSN. This occurred because the default EPS bearer had QCI 69 or 70 and the allow_ptt_bearer_transfer_during_irat parameter was set to off.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: TAU_WITH_RAT_TYPE_CHANGE
scc.description: The MME has detected that the UE attempts to perform a TAU to a TA with another RAT Type than the last visited TA.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REQUESTED_CIOT_EPS_OPTIMIZATION_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: Possible causes are as follows: - The UE indicated an unsupported CIoT EPS optimization. - The UE indicated an unsupported combination of CIoT EPS optimizations and active flag(s) in a TAU procedure. - The UE indicated an unsupported combination of CIoT EPS optimizations and active flag in a Control Plane Service Request procedure. - The configuration for the IMSI number series did not allow Non-IP access. - The data_over_nas feature or donas_non_ip_over_scef is disabled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_FROM_SGSN_DUE_TO_UE_IN_EDRX
scc.description: The paging procedure was rejected beacuse the MS is in eDrx cycle. The downlink sgnaling was rejected with the "UE_IS_TEMPORARILY_NOT_REACHABLE_DUE_TO_POWER_SAVING" EBM cause code(#232).
scc.action: It's a normal scenario for eDrx subscriber. No suggested action.

scc.name: EDRX_PAGING_TIME_WINDOW_CLOSED
scc.description: Paging Timeout, the eDRX paging time window closed before all paging attempts specified by the paging profile are performed.
scc.action: It's a normal scenario for eDrx subscriber. No suggested action.

scc.name: CIOT_EPS_OPTIMIZATION_AND_DEDICATED_BEARER_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected because CIoT EPS optimizations and dedicated bearer in combination is not supported.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HANDOVER_REJECT_DUE_TO_SOURCE_RAT_TYPE_NB
scc.description: The handover procedure was rejected beacuse source RAT type is NB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: ABORTED_DUE_TO_NAS_MESSAGE_REDIRECTION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME aborted the Attach procedure or TAU procedure because NAS message was redirected.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DONAS_NON_IP_SGI_NOT_ENABLED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP, but the 'DoNAS, PDN type Non-IP' feature for data delivery mechanism SGi, donas_non_ip_over_sgi, is not enabled.
scc.action: Consider enabling the feature donas_non_ip_over_sgi.

scc.name: DONAS_NON_IP_SCEF_NOT_ENABLED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP, but the 'DoNAS, PDN type Non-IP' feature for data delivery mechanism SCEF, donas_non_ip_over_scef, is not enabled.
scc.action: Consider enabling the feature donas_non_ip_over_scef.

scc.name: IPV4V6_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type IPv4, IPv6, or IPv4v6, but only PDN type Non-IP allowed by subscription.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check the subscription data in the HSS. Check APN conversion configuration.

scc.name: NON_IP_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP, but this is not allowed by subscription.
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly. Check the subscription data in the HSS. Check APN conversion configuration.

scc.name: NON_IP_ACCESS_DENIED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP, but the configuration for the IMSI number series did not allow Non-IP access.
scc.action: Consider allowing Non-IP access in the configuration for the IMSI number series.

scc.name: NON_IP_OVER_USER_PLANE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP without indicating Control Plane CIoT EPS optimization as supported in the UE network capability IE included in the Attach Request message sent to the MME. Non-IP is only supported for Control Plane CIoT EPS optimization (DoNAS).
scc.action: Try to secure that the devices used by subscribers are configured correctly.

scc.name: DONAS_NON_IP_NOT_ENABLED
scc.description: The UE requested PDN type Non-IP, but no licensed feature for PDN type Non-IP is enabled.
scc.action: Consider enabling the feature donas_non_ip_over_sgi.

scc.name: SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED_WITH_CP_CIOT_EPS_OPTIMIZATION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was rejected because it is not supported for a UE attached with CP CIoT EPS optimizations.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DCN_LOOKUP_FAILED__UE_USAGE_TYPE
scc.description: The lookup of the target DCN MMEGI failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure failed or the static selection using the specific UE Usage Type failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNSÂ server(s) or static configuration. Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MMEÂ DNSÂ utilities.

scc.name: MME_LOOKUP_FAILED__UE_USAGE_TYPE
scc.description: The lookup of the target MME failed, because the DNS S-NAPTR procedure failed or the static selection using the specific UE Usage Type failed.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNSÂ server(s) or static configuration. Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MMEÂ DNSÂ utilities.

scc.name: UE_USAGE_TYPE_NOT_SERVED
scc.description: This cause code is sent when the request is rejected due to the UE Usage Type is not served.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__PGW_PROTOCOL_MISMATCH
scc.description: The gateway selection procedure failed, because no valid PGW was found in IMSI Based Gw Selection configuration. None of the PGW candidates are configured with right protocol type.
scc.action: Check the IMSI Based Gateway Selection configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: INTERFERED_BY_RESUME
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a UE Context Resume Request.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REQUEST_REJECTED_IN_SOURCE_NODE
scc.description: The source node responded with REQUEST_REJECTED in Context Response.
scc.action: Check activated features with regards to CP CIoT EPS optimization.

scc.name: IMSI_GROUP_ID_AVP_SGS_DISABLED
scc.description: The UE is not allowed to connect to the CS domain in the combined procedures, because the IMSI-Group-Id AVP the MME previously received from the HSS indicated that the SGs registration is disabled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IMSI_GROUP_ID_AVP_SGS_REQUIRED
scc.description: The Attach or TAU with the request type EPS only and without the additional update type SMS only is not allowed for this UE. Because the IMSI-Group-Id AVP, the MME previously received from the HSS, indicated that the SGs registration is required.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_ODR
scc.description: The PDN was deactivated when the MME receives an MO Data Answer message with the permanent failure result code from the SCEF.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_ODR
scc.description: The last PDN was deactivated,which leads to detach for UEs not supporting Attach without PDN,when the MME receives an MO Data Answer message with the permanent failure result code from the SCEF.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_RESPONSE_FROM_SCEF
scc.description: This cause code is sent when no response is received from the SCEF.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_CMR
scc.description: This cause code is sent when the SCEF returns an error code in the Connection Management Answer message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NO_SCEF_IN_MME
scc.description: This cause code is sent when the SCEF is not configured in the MME or when SCEF information get from the HSS is not same as that configured in the MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INVALID_SCEF_IN_HSS
scc.description: This cause code is sent when no SCEF infomation or invalid SCEF infomation is received from the HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INVALID_ESM_MSG_CONTAINER
scc.description: The UE does not support EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: UE_SUBSCRIPTION_PDN_CONNECTION_RESTRICTED
scc.description: The UE subscription data in the HSS indicates "PDN-Connection-Restricted".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_AUTHENTICATION_INFO_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_OVERLOAD
scc.description: The service is rejected because of overload of Diameter traffic over the S6a interface towards a specific host/realm during the Authentication Information procedure. When the Diameter congestion control is enabled, the SGSN-MME drops a requested percentage of outgoing Diameter request messages per requested period.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of Diameter host/realm to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_UPDATE_LOCATION_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_OVERLOAD
scc.description: The service is rejected because of overload of Diameter traffic over the S6a interface towards a specific host/realm during the Update Location procedure. When the Diameter congestion control is enabled, the SGSN-MME drops a requested percentage of outgoing Diameter request messages per requested period.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of Diameter host/realm to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CONNECTION_MANAGEMENT_DUE_TO_DIAMETER_OVERLOAD
scc.description: The service is rejected because of overload of Diameter traffic over the T6a interface towards a specific host/realm during the Connection Management procedure. When the Diameter congestion control is enabled, the SGSN-MME drops a requested percentage of outgoing Diameter request messages per requested period.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of Diameter host/realm to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: IoT_UE_NO_S1U_CAPABILITY
scc.description: The service is rejected because the IoT UE request for S1-U data transport while its UE Network Capability does not support S1-U data transport.
scc.action: Analyze the UE Network Capability to check whether S1-U is support.

scc.name: CP_ONLY_PDN_TO_S1U_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The service is rejected because the Control Plane Only PDN cannot switch to establish S1-U data transport (including the Non-IP SGi PDN connection cannot be established as user plane).
scc.action: Analyze whether UE received Control Plane Only indication from ACTIVATE DEFAULT EPS BEARER CONTEXT REQUEST message in former Attach or PDN Connectivity procedure or a Non-IP SGi PDN connection cannot be established as user plane.

scc.name: IMSI_GROUP_ID_AVP_ATTACH_WITHOUT_PDN_REQUIRED
scc.description: IMSI-Group-Id in subscription data from HSS indicates UE shall Attach Without PDN Connection.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DIAMETER_ERROR_FOR_ODR
scc.description: MME receives an MO-Data-Answer with the unsuccessful DIAMETER cause from the SCEF.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DUMMY_COMBINED_REGISTRATION_WHEN_NO_CS_SERVICE
scc.description: A combined Attach procedure or combined TAU procedure is created for dummy registration when no CS domain is available.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DUMMY_COMBINED_REGISTRATION_WHEN_NO_CSFB_SUPPORTED
scc.description: A combined Attach procedure or combined TAU procedure without additional result "sms_only" is created for dummy CSFB registration when the MME can provide only SMS service.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_CC39_INSTEAD_OF_CC18_WITH_MAXIMUM_T3442_DUE_TO_DUMMY_COMBINED_REGISTRATION
scc.description: The service is rejected if no CSFB service is provided but a dummy CSFB registration is created.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_APN_RESTRICTION_BY_LOCAL_CONFIGURATION
scc.description: When this sub-cause code is used in combination with NAS CC#10, the following scenarios apply: -All the APN(s) received in the EPS Bearer Context in the Context Response or PDP Context in the SGSN Context Response message are restricted by local configuration in the new MME for a UE that does not support EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection during the Inter-MME TAU or Intra/Inter-Node TAU ISC from SGSN procedures. -All the APN(s) contained in the EPS Bearer Context are restricted by local configuration in the MME for a UE that does not support EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection during the Intra-MME TAU with Active Flag or Service Request or Control Plane Service Request procedure. When this sub-cause code is used in combination with NAS CC#14, the resolved APN is restricted by local configuration in the MME for a UE that does not support EMM-REGISTERED without PDN connection during the Attach combined with PDN Connectivity Request procedure. When this sub-cause code is used in combination with NAS CC#32, the resolved APN is restricted by local configuration in the MME during the standalone PDN Connectivity Request procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: FAILURE_DUE_TO_APN_RESTRICTION_BY_LOCAL_CONFIGURATION
scc.description: When this sub-cause code is used in combination with GTPv2 CC#81, all the APN(s) received in the EPS Bearer Context or PDP Context in the Forward Relocation Request message are restricted by local configuration in the target MME during the Inter-MME Handover or Intra/Inter-Node IRAT Handover from SGSN procedure. When this sub-cause code is used in combination with S1AP CC#516, all the APN(s) in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted by local configuration in the MME during the X2-based Handover procedure. When this sub-cause code is used in combination with S1AP CC#6, all the APN(s) in the EPS Bearer Context stored for the UE are restricted by local configuration in the MME during the S1-based Intra-MME Handover procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DISCONNECTION_DUE_TO_APN_RESTRICTION_BY_LOCAL_CONFIGURATION
scc.description: When this sub-cause code is used in combination with GTPv2 CC#0: NO_CAUSE_CODE, it means the PDN connection is deleted due to APN restriction by local configuration in the MME.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_LOCATION_BASED_IP_ALLOCATION
scc.description: The SGSN-MME initiated a detach procedure because of the Location Based IP Address Allocation feature when the UE moved out of a location-based IP address allocation area or into a new location-based IP address allocation area.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: GBR_BEARER_DELETION_DUE_TO_HANDOVER_FAILURE_IN_TARGET
scc.description: The GBR Bearer was deleted by the MME because Handover Failure In Target EPC/eNB Or Target System was received in UE Context Release Request.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PAGING_ABORT_DUE_TO_UE_ENTER_PSM
scc.description: Ongoing paging is aborted because UE has entered power saving mode during paging procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SGW_INITIATED_DELETE_BEARER_REQUEST_GTPV2_PE_16_AND_BLOCK_PGW
scc.description: No Cause IE is included in a Delete Bearer Request message sent by an SGW, the value of the PDN Reactivation Private Extension IE included in the message is 0x10, and the corresponding PGW is blocked by the MME. Note that this sub-cause code is restricted and not for general use.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SGW_INITIATED_DELETE_BEARER_REQUEST_GTPV2_PE_17_AND_BLOCK_PGW
scc.description: No Cause IE is included in a Delete Bearer Request message sent by an SGW, the value of the PDN Reactivation Private Extension IE included in the message is 0x11, and the corresponding PGW is blocked by the MME. Note that this sub-cause code is restricted and not for general use.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: S11U_SERVICE_NOT_CONFIGURED
scc.description: PDN is rejected or disconnected because the local S11 GTP-U IP service is not configured when control plane data transfer on SGi interface is requested.
scc.action: Check the S11 GTP-U IP service configuration in SGSN-MME.

scc.name: COMMUNICATION_TOWARDS_SCEF_OR_SGW_UNSUCCESSFUL
scc.description: Possible causes are as follows: - The communication towards the SGW or the SCEF failed. - SCEF information is not configured in the MME. - The configuration for the IMSI number series does not allow Non-IP access. - The Non-IP Data Delivery over SCEF feature is disabled.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: CREATE_INDIRECT_DATA_FORWARDING_RESPONSE_WITH_BEARER_CAUSE_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responds with Create Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Response message with a Bearer Cause indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 Cause received from the SGW (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Also check Bearer Causes in the EBM event. Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: CREATE_INDIRECT_DATA_FORWARDING_RESPONSE_WITH_CC_FROM_SGW
scc.description: The SGW responds with Create Indirect Data Forwarding Tunnel Response message with a GTPv2 Cause indicating failure.
scc.action: Check the GTPv2 Cause received from the SGW (ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE in the EBM event). Troubleshoot the SGW.

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE_DUE_TO_NO_DEFAULT_BEARERS
scc.description: The handover procedure is rejected due to no default bearers.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: SUBSCRIBER_DETACHED_BY_CLI_COMMAND
scc.description: The detach procedure has been triggered by action_ue_detach_start CLI command without subscriber removal.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: INTERFERING_ENB_CP_RELOCATION
scc.description: The current procedure is aborted by an eNB CP relocation indication message
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: CATM_DEVICES_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The LTE-M UE is restricted according to one of the following factors: - The CatMCauseCode parameter configured on the IMSI number series level or the node level - The Access Restriction Data IE included in the Update Location Answer or the Insert Subscriber Data Request message from the HSS
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: SCC_REJECT_CAUSE_120_FROM_SGW_GTP_C_ENTITY_CONGESTION
scc.description: Rejected due to when no Create Session Response message is received after the MME sends a Create Session Request message to the SGW
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DONAS_NOT_SUPPORT_EMERGENCY_PDN
scc.description: DoNAS not suppot emergency pdn.
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE_DUE_TO_NO_HANDOVER_REQUEST_ACKNOWLEDGE
scc.description: No Handover Request Acknowledge was received from target eNodeB before S1THoRequestAck timer expires.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the S1AP traffic toward the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE_DUE_TO_NO_HANDOVER_NOTIFY
scc.description: No Handover Notify was received from target eNodeB before S1THoNotify timer expires.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the S1AP traffic toward the eNodeB, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the eNodeB.

scc.name: RELOCATION_CANCEL_REQUEST_RECEIVED
scc.description: Target MME receives Relocation Cancel Request from source side during handover.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the source RNC or eNodeB.

scc.name: IRAT_HANDOVER_FAILURE_DUE_TO_NO_ASSIGNED_TI
scc.description: The IRAT handover from LTE to WCDMA fails because transfer of converted PDP context from MME to SGSN is impossible due to no TI (Transaction Identifier) assigned to the BEARER.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE why MS Network Capability is not included in Attach request or TAU request before the IRAT handover.

scc.name: HANDOVER_FAILURE_DUE_TO_NO_FORWARD_RELOCATION_COMPLETE
scc.description: No Forward Relocation Complete or Forward Relocation Complete Notification was received from target SGSN or MME before TRELOCComplete timer expires in IRAT LTE to WCDMA Handover or inter-MME S1 handover.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the Gtpv1 or Gtpv2 traffic toward the target SGSN-MME, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the target SGSN-MME.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_UE_EMERGENCY_ATTACHED
scc.description: The signalling procedure was rejected because of emergency attached UE.
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: T3X01_EXPIRY
scc.description: The T3x01 timer that the MME starts after sending a Location Request message to the E-SMLC expires due to no response from the E-SMLC.
scc.action: Check peer E-SMLC.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_22_DUE_TO_GTPC_OVERLOAD
scc.description: A NAS Request of mobility procedure was rejected since peer GW is in overloaded state. The MME responded the UE with the "Congestion" EMM cause code (#22) and back-off timer T3346.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of peer GW to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: REJECT_CAUSE_26_DUE_TO_GTPC_OVERLOAD
scc.description: A NAS Request of session procedure was rejected since peer GW is in overloaded state. The MME responded the UE with the "Insufficient Resources" ESM cause code (#26) and back-off timer.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of peer GW to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: ATTEMPT_BY_SGW_TO_CHANGE_MBR_OR_GBR
scc.description: The Update Bearer Request received from the SGW tried to update MBR or GBR values from non-zero to zero or vice versa. This is not allowed.
scc.action: Check the QoS configuration in the PGW or the PCRF.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_GTPC_OVERLOAD
scc.description: A PDN was deactivated by MME since peer GW is in overloaded state.
scc.action: Analyze the reasons for overload of peer GW to check if its capacity is enough to handle all incoming traffic.

scc.name: FEATURE_SMS_OVER_SGS_AND_SGD_IS_DISABLED
scc.description: The UE is not allowed to use SMS through the SGs or SGd interface in the combined attach procedure, EPS attach with SMS only procedure, combined TAU procedure and EPS TAU with SMS only procedure, because the SMS over SGs feature or SMS over SGd feature is deactivated. The list_feature_state CLI command can be used to check the configuration for the SMS over SGs or SMS over SGd feature.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_DUE_TO_5GS_SUBSCRIPTION_RESTRICTED
scc.description: The UE was detached when 5GS subscription is restricted for all PDNs.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: PDN_DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_5GS_SUBSCRIPTION_RESTRICTED
scc.description: The PDN was deactivated when 5GS subscription is restricted for this PDN.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: FEATURE_HIGH_ACCURACY_LOCATION_ESTIMATE_IS_DISABLED
scc.description: The MME is not allowed to transmit high accuracy location estimates to the GMLC as the Transfer of High Accuracy Location Estimate feature is deactivated.
scc.action: The list_feature_state CLI command can be used to check the configuration for the Transfer of High Accuracy Location Estimate feature.

scc.name: CS_RESTRICTED_BY_NETWORK_ACCESS_MODE_FROM_HSS
scc.description: SGs interaction is not allowed by Network-Access-Mode in the subscription data from HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DUMMY_COMBINED_REGISTRATION_WHEN_CS_RESTRICTED_BY_NAM_FROM_HSS
scc.description: A combined Attach or combined TAU procedure is created for dummy registration, when SGs interaction is not allowed by Network-Access-Mode in the subscription data from HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DETACH_WITH_REATTACH_REQUIRED_DUE_TO_MSISDN_CHANGE
scc.description: Detach procedure initiated when the MSISDN in subscription data received in the Insert Subscriber Data Request message from the HSS/HLR is different from the MSISDN currently stored in the MME. The type of the detach procedure is reattach_required.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_SESSION_DISCONTINUITY_TO_GPRS
scc.description: The SGSN-MME initiates a deactivation procedure because the session cannot be moved to a GPRS network due to capability of 5GS interworking.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: DEACTIVATED_DUE_TO_SESSION_DISCONTINUITY_TO_5GS
scc.description: The SGSN-MME initiates a deactivation procedure because the session cannot be moved to a 5GS network due to incapability of 5GS interworking.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HO_REJECTED_DUE_TO_PDN_NOT_TRANSFERRED_DURING_IRAT
scc.description: The MME rejects the UE handover to the SGSN because the last session cannot be moved to a GPRS network due to PDN session capability of 5GS interworking.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: GW_SELECTION_FAILED__LOCAL_EMERGENCY_PGW_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The Gateway selection procedure failed, because no PGW was found in the local emergency PGW profile configuration for the emergency APN.
scc.action: Check the local emergency PGW profile configuration in the SGSN-MME.

scc.name: TIMEOUT_ATTACH_COMPLETE
scc.description: This cause code indicates that no response is received from the UE while waiting for the Attach Complete message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NB_EMERGENCY_SERVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: This cause code indicates that support for emergency bearer services is not available when the UE is using NB-IoT.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HO_REJECTED_DUE_TO_PDN_NOT_TRANSFERRED_DURING_HO_TO_5GS
scc.description: The MME rejects the UE handover from EPS to 5GS because no PDN session can be moved to a 5GS network. This is because no PDN session supports 5GS interworking.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: HO_FAILUIRE_DUE_TO_FEATURE_DEACTIVATED
scc.description: Handover Preparation fails because the EPS to 5GS Handover or the PS Handover from LTE to WCDMA function is disabled.
scc.action: Check configurations of the Advanced 4G/5G Interworking license and the eps_to_5gs_ho_allowed node function or check the configuration of the PS Handover license.

scc.name: AMF_LOOKUP_FAILED__TAI_NOT_FOUND_IN_DNS
scc.description: The lookup of the target AMF failed, because the DNS NAPTR procedure or Type A/AAAA query using the TAI FQDN can not locate the target AMF.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: AMF_LOOKUP_FAILED__GUAMI_NOT_FOUND_IN_DNS
scc.description: The lookup of the source AMF failed, because the DNS NAPTR or procedure Type A/AAAA query using the AMF Instance FQDN can not locate the source AMF.
scc.action: Check the records provisioned in the DNS server(s). Troubleshoot using the test_dns_resolve command or other SGSN-MME DNS utilities.

scc.name: WB_EXCEPT_LTE_M_NOT_ALLOWED
scc.description: The UE is restricted from the WB-E-UTRAN except the LTE-M access according to the Access Restriction Data IE. The Access Restriction Data IE is included in the Update Location Answer or the Insert Subscriber Data Request message from the HSS.
scc.action: No suggested action

scc.name: APN_REDIRECTION_REJECTED_BY_APN
scc.description: The APN Redirection was rejected, since the UE-requested APN or the converted APN resulting from the APN Conversion feature is configured in the APN redirection exception list.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the MME.

scc.name: NON_MPS_PAGING_ABORTED_DUE_TO_HIGHER_PRIORITY_CS_SERVICE_RECEIVED
scc.description: The ongoing Paging procedure was aborted by the MME because the received CS service has a higher priority compared with the previously received message. This happened when MPS-classified ARP level is not configured.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: NON_MPS_PAGING_ABORTED_DUE_TO_DDN_WITH_HIGHER_SERVICE_LEVEL_RECEIVED
scc.description: The ongoing Paging procedure was aborted by the MME because the received DDN message has a higher service level priority than that of the previously received message. This happened when MPS-classified ARP level is not configured.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: IMSINS_COMBINED_RESGISTRATION_SETTING_ALLOWED_SMS_ONLY
scc.description: UE request Combined Attach/TAU without Additional Update type IE, but MME provides sms only due to CombinedRegistrationSetting parameter is set to allowed_sms_only.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: REJECT_DUE_TO_SERVICE_GAP_CONTROL
scc.description: A Mobile-originated Request is rejected since UE is controlled by Service Gap Control function.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_NO_VALUE
scc.description: No sub-cause code is available.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SUCCESS
scc.description: Success
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_UE_AUTHENTICATION_CHECK_FAILED
scc.description: A fault occurred during authentication of the UE.
scc.action: Check the incoming Authentication Response message.

scc.name: N_TAI_NOT_REGISTERED
scc.description: UE Registered in a TAI which was not registered in the AMF by any gNodeB.
scc.action: Check the NG-RAN configuration.

scc.name: N_SECURITY_MODE_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no Security Mode Complete message from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: N_SECURITY_MODE_REJECT
scc.description: UE rejected the Security Mode Command.
scc.action: Check the originating cause code.

scc.name: N_NO_NRF_CONFIGURED
scc.description: No NRF service instance was configured in the AMF.
scc.action: Configure an NRF service instance in the AMF using the create_nrf_service_instance CLI command.

scc.name: N_EAP_AKA_AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_EAP_AKA_AUTHENTICATION_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INITIAL_CONTEXT_SETUP_FAILURE
scc.description: The Initial Context setup failed.
scc.action: Check the compatibility between the gNodeB configuration and the AMF configuration.

scc.name: N_UE_SECURITY_ALGORITHM_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SERVICE_DISCOVERY_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response to the "Nnrf_NFDiscovery/HTTP GET nf-instances" operation.
scc.action: Check the HTTP communication with the NRF service.

scc.name: N_SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ERROR
scc.description: There was an error code in response to the "Nnrf_NFDiscovery/HTTP GET nf-instances" operation.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_GET_NSSAI_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: The UDM does not reply at retrieval of Slice Selection Subscription Data
scc.action: Check HTTP communication with the UDM service

scc.name: N_GET_NSSAI_ERROR
scc.description: The UDM service replies with error cause at retrieval of Slice Selection Subscription Data
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause

scc.name: N_REGISTER_AMF_3GPP_ACCESS_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response at registration on the Nudm_UEContextManagement UDM service.
scc.action: Check the HTTP communication with the UDM service.

scc.name: N_REGISTER_AMF_3GPP_ACCESS_ERROR
scc.description: The was a response indicating an error at registration on the Nudm_UEContextManagement UDM service.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event for information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_GET_AM_SUBDATA_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response when retrieving the Access and Mobility subscripion data over the Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement UDM service.
scc.action: Check the SBI configuration.

scc.name: N_GET_SMF_SELECT_SUBDATA_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_GET_AM_SUBDATA_ERROR
scc.description: There was a response indicating an error when retrieving Access and Mobility subscripion data over the Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement UDM service.
scc.action: Check the N_ORIGINATING_CAUSE_CODE parameter and the HTTP_PROBLEM_DETAILS_CAUSE parameter.

scc.name: N_GET_SMF_SELECT_SUBDATA_ERROR
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SUBSCRIBE_AM_DATA_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SUBSCRIBE_SMF_DATA_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SUBSCRIBE_AM_DATA_ERROR
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_SUBSCRIBE_SMF_DATA_ERROR
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_FORBIDDEN_AREA_FROM_UDM
scc.description: The UE was in a forbidden tracking area.
scc.action: Check the subscription data.

scc.name: N_RAT_RESTRICTION
scc.description: The UE was in a restricted RAT.
scc.action: Check the subscription data.

scc.name: N_SUPI_PLMN_NOT_CONFIGURED
scc.description: The UE SUPI PLMN was not configured in the AMF.
scc.action: Check the configuration.

scc.name: N_VERSIONS_FROM_NRF_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The "Nnrf_NFDiscovery/HTTP GET nf-instances" operation returned no versions supported by AMF.
scc.action: Check the AMF and SBI service version compability.

scc.name: N_NO_UE_IDENTITY
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_IMEI_IDENTITY_TYPE_FROM_UE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_STMSI_IDENTITY_TYPE_FROM_UE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_IMEISV_IDENTITY_TYPE_FROM_UE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_IDENTITY_FROM_UE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_NSSAI_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: Resulting NSSAI is not supported
scc.action: Check the NSSAI configuration

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: Reserved
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_FAILURE
scc.description: There was an Authentication Failure response received from the UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the radio interface.

scc.name: N_INITIAL_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
scc.description: A failure was discovered during the initial checks during the security procedure.
scc.action: Check the incoming NAS message.

scc.name: N_SECURITY_MODE_CHECK_FAILED
scc.description: A fault ocurred during the Security Mode procedure.
scc.action: Check the incoming Security Mode Complete message.

scc.name: N_UE_IDENTITY_CHECK_FAILED
scc.description: A fault occurred during the Identity Request procedure.
scc.action: Check the incoming Identity Response message.

scc.name: N_SERVICE_DISCOVERY_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response to the "Nnrf_NFDiscovery/HTTP GET nf-instances" operation can not be decoded due to an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_NO_NF_SERVICE_AVAILABLE
scc.description: The "Nnrf_NFDiscovery/HTTP GET nf-instances" contained a result which resulted in the requested service not being available.
scc.action: Check the configuration in the NRF for the requested service.

scc.name: N_NO_NSSF_CONFIGURED
scc.description: No NSSF service instance was configured in the AMF.
scc.action: Configure an NSSF service instance in the AMF using the create_nssf_service_instance CLI command.

scc.name: N_SERVICE_DISCOVERY_ERROR_NO_REQUEST
scc.description: The discovery service was prepared but no HTTP request was sent out due to an error.
scc.action: Check the NRF service configuration in the AMF.

scc.name: N_GET_NSSAI_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The UDM replies with a non-error cause at retrieval of Slice Selection Subscription Data, but a protocol error appeared
scc.action: Check the HTTP response message

scc.name: N_S1_MODE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The UE does not support S1 mode and is not allowed to move to EPS.
scc.action: Check the S1 mode bit in the 5GMM Capability IE.

scc.name: N_ACCESS_RESTRICTED
scc.description: Inter RAT Mobility was not allowed due to RAT Restrictions or Core Network Type Restrictions in the subscription data.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_DNS_TIMEOUT
scc.description: The DNS query timed out.
scc.action: Check the communication towards the DNS server(s).Use the CLI commands action_icmp_ping, action_icmp_trace_route to troubleshoot.

scc.name: N_DNS_QUERY_FAILURE
scc.description: During interworking with the EPS, the AMF failed to find the source or target MME due to a negative DNS answer.
scc.action: Check the DNS configuration and the GUMMEI/TAI FQDN.

scc.name: N_RETRIEVE_SM_CONTEXT_FAILURE
scc.description: The AMF failed to retrieve SM Context successfully (e.g. no TCP connection towards SMF; no response; response with error status codes; response with incorrect mandatory IE, etc.).
scc.action: Check the DNS configuration and the GUMMEI/TAI FQDN.

scc.name: N_FORWARD_RELOCATION_RESPONSE_FAILURE
scc.description: The source AMF failed to receive a successful Forward Relocation Response from the target MME during 5GS to EPS Handover (e.g. no response, negative response or response with incorrect IE, etc.).
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture N26 traffic towards the MME.

scc.name: N_FORWARD_RELOCATION_COMPLETE_NOTIFICATION_TIMEOUT
scc.description: The source AMF failed to receive the Forward Relocation Complete Notification message before the AmfTRelocComplete timer expires during 5GS to EPS Handover.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the N26 traffic toward the target MME, and analyze the captured traffic. Troubleshoot the target MME.

scc.name: N_PEI_BLACKLISTED
scc.description: The PEI is blacklisted in the 5G-EIR.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_UDM_GET_DATA_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response from the Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement UDM service when retrieving subscription data contained an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_UDM_SUBSCRIBE_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response from the Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement UDM service when subscribing to subscription data contained an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_REGISTER_AMF_3GPP_ACCESS_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response from the Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement UDM service at registration contained an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_NO_N26_SUPPORT_IN_PLMN
scc.description: The currently configured PLMN does not support the N26 Interface.
scc.action: Check the configured SupportN26 parameter in the create_plmn CLI command.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_CONFIRMATION_ERROR
scc.description: There was an error code or a protocol error in response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP PUT ConfirmationData" operation.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_CONFIRMATION_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP PUT ConfirmationData" operation.
scc.action: Check the HTTP communication with the AUSF service.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_INFORMATION_ERROR
scc.description: There was an error code or a protocol error in response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP POST AuthenticationInfo" operation.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_INFORMATION_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP POST AuthenticationInfo" operation.
scc.action: Check the HTTP communication with the AUSF service.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_INFORMATION_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP POST AuthenticationInfo" operation can not be decoded due to an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_AUTHENTICATION_CONFIRMATION_HTTP_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The response to the "Nausf_UEAuthentication/HTTP PUT ConfirmationData" operation can not be decoded due to an HTTP protocol error.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_ALL_PDU_SESSIONS_FAILED_TO_SWITCH
scc.description: The handover is rejected because the 5GC or the target NG-RAN cannot accept any of the requested PDU session resources.
scc.action: Check the PDU Session Cause(s) in the EBM event or the HTTP communication with the SMF service.

scc.name: N_CREATE_SM_CONTEXT_ERROR
scc.description: An error occurred during the Nsmf_PduSession/HTTP POST SmContextCreateData operation.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause. Alternatively, use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_CREATE_SM_CONTEXT_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response to the Nsmf_PduSession/HTTP POST SmContextCreateData operation.
scc.action: Check the HTTP communication with the SMF service.

scc.name: N_NSSELECTION_NSSF_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response when the AMF retrieves the authorized network slice information using the Nnssf_NSSelection service.
scc.action: Check HTTP communication with the NSSF service.

scc.name: N_NSSELECTION_NSSF_ERROR
scc.description: There was a response indicating an error when the AMF retrieves the authorized network slice information using the Nnssf_NSSelection service.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_REROUTE_FAIL_TARGET_AMF_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: There was no response when the AMF notifies N1 messages during the registration with AMF re-allocation procedure using the Namf_Communication N1MessageNotify service operation.
scc.action: Check HTTP communication with the AMF service.

scc.name: N_REROUTE_FAIL_TARGET_AMF_ERROR
scc.description: There was a response indicating an error when the AMF notifies N1 messages during the registration with AMF re-allocation procedure using the Namf_Communication N1MessageNotify service operation.
scc.action: Check the SBI information in the EBM event to get information about the root cause.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__FORMERR
scc.description: The external DNS server or the caching resolver in the AMF returned error code 1 (Format Error).
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the DNS traffic between the AMF and the DNS server. Check the format of the query sent by the AMF.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__SERVFAIL
scc.description: The external DNS server or the caching resolver in the AMF returned error code 2 (Server Failure).
scc.action: Make sure the DNS server configuration in the PCC is correct. Troubleshoot the DNS server.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__NXDOMAIN
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 3 (Non-Existent Domain). The FQDN that the AMF tried to lookup does not exist in the DNS server.
scc.action: Check the records defined in the DNS server(s).

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__NOTIMP
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 4 (Not Implemented). The server does not support the query sent by the network function.
scc.action: Update the DNS server to make it compliant with the DNS query sent.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__REFUSED
scc.description: The external DNS server or the caching resolver in the AMF returned error code 5 (Query Refused).
scc.action: Troubleshoot the DNS server.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__BADVERS
scc.description: The external DNS server returned error code 16 (Bad OPT Version).
scc.action: Check if the DNS server is compliant with the current OPT version.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__FORMAT_ERROR
scc.description: The SBI client in the AMF rejected the format of the DNS query.
scc.action: Make sure that the FQDN is correctly formatted. Contact Ericsson Support if this sub-cause code occurs frequently.

scc.name: N_DNS_LOOKUP_FAILED__UNKNOWN_ERROR
scc.description: The external DNS server, the caching resolver in the AMF, or the DNS client in the AMF returned an unknown error code.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the DNS traffic between the AMF and the DNS server. Check if the DNS server returns any error codes.

scc.name: N_SBI_CLIENT__NO_CONNECTION
scc.description: The SBI client was unable to establish a connection, or the connection was aborted.
scc.action: Check the network configuration if this sub-cause code occurs frequently.

scc.name: N_GET_SUBDATA_USER_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The AMF received a 404 HTTP status code and the application error USER_NOT_FOUND from the UDM during an Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement Get service operation to re-retrieve the subscription data of the UE.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_SUBSCRIBE_SUBDATA_USER_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: The AMF received a 404 HTTP status code and the application error USER_NOT_FOUND from the UDM during an Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement Subscribe service operation to resubscribe to subscription data change notifications for the UE.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_SUBDATA_UNAVAILABLE
scc.description: The AMF failed to re-retrieve the subscription data or failed to resubscribe to subscription data change notifications for the UE because of a persistent error in the communication with the UDM.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_EMPTY_SUBSCRIPTION_DATA
scc.description: The AMF removed the Access and Mobility Subscription data of the UE according to a subscription data change notification from the UDM during an Nudm_SubscriberDataManagement Notification service operation.
scc.action: Use ITC or UE Trace to capture the HTTP response for analysis.

scc.name: N_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED_DUE_TO_CHALLENGE_APPLICABLE
scc.description: The request is blocked because the challenge from the NF service producer is applicable and no access token or no new access token is available in the NF service request. After an NF service request from the AMF is rejected by the NF servive producer with a "401 Unauthorized" status code, the AMF is challenged by the NF service producer.
scc.action: Check the configuration of Nnrf_AccessToken NF service. Check the configuration of NF service authorization. For more information, see SBI Authorization (CLI).

scc.name: N_AUTHORIZATION_FAILED
scc.description: The procedure fails because of NF service authorization.
scc.action: If the authorization fails over SBI, check the configuration of NF service authorization, the NRF, and the NF service producer. For more information, see SBI Authorization (CLI).

scc.name: N_SERVICE_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
scc.description: The service type is not supported.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the N1 traffic from the UE, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: N_INITIAL_CONTEXT_SETUP_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: The Initial Context Setup procedure timed out. No Initial Context Setup Response was received.
scc.action: Check NGAP communication with gNodeB.

scc.name: N_NAS_PROTOCOL_ERROR
scc.description: The UE sent a faulty NAS message.
scc.action: Use ITC to capture the N1 traffic from the UE, and analyze the captured traffic.

scc.name: N_UE_CONTEXT_MODIFICATION_FAILURE
scc.description: The UE Context Modification procedure failed.
scc.action: Check the compatibility between the gNodeB configuration and the AMF configuration.

scc.name: N_UE_CONTEXT_MODIFICATION_NO_RESPONSE
scc.description: The UE Context Modification procedure timed out. No UE Context Modification Response was received.
scc.action: Check NGAP communication with gNodeB.

scc.name: N_TIMEOUT_PAGING
scc.description: No paging response was received from the UE. This can happen if the UE has lost radio coverage.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_OVERLOAD
scc.description: The node has been overloaded.
scc.action: Check the load of node.

scc.name: N_TA_FROM_GNODEB_NOT_IN_TAI_LIST
scc.description: The AMF received a Service Request where the TAI from the gNodeB does not match the UE TAI list in the AMF.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE and the gNodeB.

scc.name: N_RETRIEVAL_FAILURE
scc.description: There was an attempt to retrieve a UE geo-replica, but no successful Retrieval Response was received.
scc.action: Check the status of the remote AMF. Also check HTTP communication with the AMF service.

scc.name: N_SUPI_CONFLICT
scc.description: A fault occurred when the SUPI for this UE has been associated to another UE.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: N_INVALID_STMSI
scc.description: The 5G-S-TMSI included in Service Request message carried in Uplink NAS Transport message cannot match with the 5G-S-TMSI of the UE context which is stored in the AMF.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the UE.

scc.name: N_REGISTERED_NF_SERVICE_PROFILES_NOT_FOUND
scc.description: This sub-cause code indicates that the cache is empty because the status of all NF profiles is NF_DEREGISTERED.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the NRF.

scc.name: N_UNABLE_TO_FILTER_NF_SERVICE_PROFILES
scc.description: This sub-cause code indicates that no NF service profiles with a REGISTERED NF status and NF service status were found in the cache or in the NF discovery results.
scc.action: Troubleshoot the NRF.

scc.name: N_RAT_RESTRICTION_FROM_UDM
scc.description: The UE was in a restricted RAT.
scc.action: Check the Access and Mobility Subscribtion data in UDM.

scc.name: N_FORBIDDEN_AREA
scc.description: The UE was in a forbidden tracking area.
scc.action: Check the local AMF configuration of forbidden areas.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_NORMAL_DEREGISTRATION_FROM_UE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered by a Deregistration request with the Deregistration type "Normal de-registration" from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_SWITCHOFF_DEREGISTRATION_FROM_UE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered by a Deregistration request with the Deregistration type "Switch off" from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_UE_CONTEXT_RELEASE_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a UE Context Release Request from the gNodeB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_INITIAL_REGISTRATION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Registration request with the 5GS registration type "initial registration" from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_PERIODIC_REGISTRATION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Registration request with the 5GS registration type "periodic registration updating" from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_MOBILITY_REGISTRATION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Registration request with the 5GS registration type "mobility registration updating" from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_DEREGISTRATION_NOTIFICATION_SUBSCRIPTION_WITHDRAWN
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Nudm_UECM_DeregistrationNotification request from the UDM with the reason "SUBSCRIPTION_WITHDRAWN".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_DEREGISTRATION_NOTIFICATION_AREA_CHANGE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Nudm_UECM_DeregistrationNotification request from the UDM with the reason "UE_REGISTRATION_AREA_CHANGE".
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_NG_RESET
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an NG Reset or an Error Indication message which triggered an NG Reset from the gNodeB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_ERROR_INDICATION
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Error Indication message from the gNodeB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_HANDOVER_CANCEL
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Handover Cancel message from the gNodeB.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_UE_CONTEXT_TRANSFER
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Namf_Communication_UEContextTransfer request from another AMF.
scc.action: No suggested action.

subcausecodes.scc: N_INTERFERING_OTHER_INITIAL_UE_MESSAGE The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Initial UE message from the UE. No suggested action.:

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_OTHER_UPLINK_NAS_TRANSPORT
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an Uplink NAS Transport message from the UE.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_OTHER_SIGNALING
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by other signaling interference.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_HANDOVER
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Handover Required message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_INITIAL_UE_SERVICE_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an initial UE Service Request message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_UPLINK_NAS_SERVICE_REQUEST
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by an uplink NAS Service Request message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_5GS_TO_EPS_HANDOVER
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a 5GS to EPS handover procedure.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_RELEASE_SM_CONTEXT
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a Release SM Context Request message.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_INTERFERING_N2_RELEASE
scc.description: The signaling procedure was interfered with by a release of the N2 connection.
scc.action: No suggested action.

scc.name: N_UE_REJECTED_DUE_TO_AMF_ACCESS_THROTTLE
scc.description: This sub-cause code indicates that the request from the UE was rejected because of the AMF Access Throttle function.
scc.action: To stop UEs from being rejected by the AMF Access Throttle function, set the AccessThrottleInitFraction and the AccessThrottleSubsequentFraction parameters to 0.
